name: Retinol Reformu00ae Treatment Serum
about: What it is:A cult-favorite retinol and AHA serum clinically shown to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles while visibly firming and brightening for glowing, younger-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Encapsulated Retinol: Non-irritating retinol that improves the look of fine lines, texture, and elasticity..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Utilizing a time-release, encapsulated retinol, this formula delivers a consistent stream of retinol throughout the night to minimize irritation often experienced with retinol products. The formula also contains an AHA for smoothing and visible brightening benefits in as few as two weeks. This serum is clinically shown to improve texture in two weeks and reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles in eight weeks..Clinical Results:Results from a clinical study conducted on 35 women ages 25 to 50 via visual evaluation and instrumental measurement over 12 weeks of use:
ingredients: -Encapsulated Retinol: Non-irritating retinol that improves the look of fine lines, texture, and elasticity..-AHA: Exfoliates to improve texture and uneven tone for smoother, brighter-looking skin..-Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract: Antioxidant that helps reduce visible signs of aging and defend against pollution...Aqua (Water, Eau), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Lactobacillus Ferment, Isohexadecane, Retinol, Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Cire de Carnauba), Glucosamine HCl, Plankton Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Niacinamide, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Linoleic Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Phospholipids, Propanediol, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Tocopherol, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba, (Guar) Gum, Maltodextrin, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Algin, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, BHT, BHA, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the evening, smooth one to two pumps onto clean, dry skin. .-Start with one to two nights a week, add a night each week, building up to as often as your skin can tolerate..-Follow with a moisturizer as needed. .-Be sure to use a sunscreen daily..-Avoid using other AHA products on the same night as Retinol Reform.  .-Do not use if pregnant or nursing.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using retinol for a long time, and this one has quickly become a favorite! First off, the packaging is beautiful and feels premium. While it does have a slightly off-putting smell, it fades fast. Despite this minor drawback, Iu2019d rate it 4 out of 5 stars! Overall, itu2019s a great product.

reviews.review_title: Too strong for my sensitive combination skin

reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of Retinol based products. I wish I had discovered its benefits sooner. As I am new to Shani Darden, I wanted to give this product a try. The Retinol Reform serum comes in a sturdy plastic bottle with a pump dispenser. The texture is lightweight and goes into my skin right away. I have sensitive combination skin, and this product felt a bit too strong for my skin. It dried my skin, and I did experience redness, itchiness, sensitivity, and even breakouts. For now, I stopped using it and will see how it will work out for my skin in the future.

reviews.review_text: For some time now, Iu2019ve noticed how my skin has lost firmness, smoothness, and radiance, and looks much more tired. So far, Iu2019ve noticed smoother, firmer, and most importantly, more radiant skin. I didnu2019t experience any side effects from using this cream, so Iu2019ll continue using it for 2 more weeks to see the final results and achieve a more radiant and healthy skin. I definitely recommend it.

My laugh lines & eye hollows somehow fill in so much that I don't daydream about filler or plastic surgery. People ALWAYS think I'm in my 30s! I even got a gorgeous bf that's 20 years younger! It's been 3 years!   When my last bottle ran out I decided to go to prescription strength retinol thinking it would do even more! Sigh... Nope. It's been 6 months on the Rx strength & I looked lots older than I did on Retinol Reform. ud83dude2d I found a tiny bit 1 night & tried it again. Of course the NEXT DAY I looked back to my full bouncy skin. I wish it was cheaper... But my gawd it WORKS!   PS it took 3 months b4 I reached full results. The bad reviews are frustrating! Yes, you may purge. You must use it correctly or yeah, you'll get irritated or dry. It's not a moisturizer! Use a cream after or do the sandwich method! Start 1-2/week then build up tolerance! reviews.review_title: Poor results and lack of brand transparency
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this was a miss for me. I REALLY wanted to like it, but ultimately returned it for two reasons. The first, was that this broke me out.  I know about the retinol purge and have never experienced it with any other retinoid products I've used, but I kept trialing this over about a 6 week period to see if the breakouts would stop. I ONLY got breakouts the morning after using this product, never on any other day. I figured that by the 4th or 5th use it would stop or wane, if it really was a purge, but it didn't.   The second reason I returned it, is because of the lack of transparency. I did some research before purchasing - it's on lots of best lists and lots of people say it brings results. But shortly after I purchased, I felt like I needed to look again. I realized that the strength or percentage of retinol in this product was nowhere to be found! I saw the brand answer this question -- they claimed that the formula and percentage was proprietary and is not shared. This made me really nervous, but I told myself: I trust Shani and her brand, and if it works, it works. But after dealing with the breakouts, I did further research and realized that it really wasn't appropriate to be using a retinoid product where I had NO CLUE about the strength/concentration of the formula. I'd have no idea how to adjust, up or down, to get to a product or formula that works for me! As someone who tries to be an informed consumer, this became a red flag that I feel I shouldn't have ignored in favor of efficacy, because there's plenty of other effective retinoids where I know what I'm getting.   I've since tried a new retinoid, a retinal, that gave me zero irritation and zero breakouts, so unfortunately I do know it was this product that was causing my issue. I would encourage this brand to let consumers know the percentage of retinol in this product. Transparency can only help your consumers, if that's what's truly important to your brand!

reviews.review_title: A Game changer for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently added the Shani Darden Moisture Boost Plumping Serum to my skincare routine, and I must say, it's been a game-changer for my dry skin. First, the packaging is sleek and convenient, making it easy to dispense the right amount of product without any mess. The serum itself has a lightweight and silky texture that absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving no greasy residue behind. What truly sets the Shani Darden Moisture Boost Plumping Serum apart is its plumping effect. My skin looks noticeably more supple and youthful, and fine lines around my eyes and mouth appear softened. It's like a burst of hydration that lasts throughout the day. I appreciate that this serum is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. I've had no adverse reactions, redness, or breakouts since incorporating it into my routine. While the price point is higher than some other serums on the market, I believe the results justify the investment. A little goes a long way, so the bottle should last for a decent amount of time. In conclusion, this serum has become a staple in my skincare routine. If you're struggling with dryness, fine lines, or just want to give your skin a boost of hydration, I highly recommend giving this serum a try. It's a luxurious treat for your skin that delivers on its promises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden Retinol Reform was gifted to me by Influenster and Shani Darden in exchange for my honest review.   I have heard it countless timesu2026wash, moisturize, retinol and sunscreen are the 4 steps to clean, youthful skin!!! And while Iu2019ve been Retin-Au2019s number one fan for many years, I have always had to be so strategic about not putting it in certain areas, to taper off in the sunny, summer months, not to use it before certain events because I might be in a peeling fazeu2026and so on!! Because thereu2019s so much to think about every time I slather that magic potion on my face, I tend to use it less often than I should!!   Insert Shani Dardenu2019s Retinol Reform!! The first week I had it, I let my skin be my guide!!! I used it for 7 days straight before I took a lazy break (ie. I was too lazy to wash my face and put it on before bed). First thought was, is this workingu2026because I wasnu2019t flaking, I wasnu2019t getting raw in areas around my eyes or nose and my skin felt perfectly happy!! The 2nd week is when I noticed, my face was in a very happy place!! My skin tone looked more even, my texture was smooth and I still didnu2019t have any skin sensitivity!!! Week 3, I realize that this could be something I can use daily because my skin had zero sensitivity to it and it left my skin looking improved from where I started 3 weeks prior.  My take away is, it is a lightweight formula, with a mild scent and itu2019s verrrryyyyy gentleu2026maybe a little too gentle for the more mature issues Iu2019m trying to addressu2026but absolutely perfect for someone who is just starting a retinol or has sensitive skin.

Itu2019s not a very affordable product, but you just need a little,  it will last A couple months, probably, so it worth the price on the long term. reviews.review_title: Real results found with this oneu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my mid 40s and have been using non prescription retinol products, or retinol alternative products, for the last few years. I have combo-leaning dry, sensitive, reactive skin. I take pretty good care of it but I have been having issues with texture on my forehead and on my cheek areas - basically beside my nose going downwards on the sides of my mouth - for years. I have wished at many times to have my oily skin back, but I reckon this is just aging. I have used a lot of different acidic products with varying degrees of success. I prefer glycolic acid over lactic but went into trying Retinol Reform with an open and hopeful mind. First, itu2019s incredibly gentle. I had zero reactions, redness, anything negative. Absorbs quick, and doesnu2019t have much of a scent. Itu2019s more moisturizing than I expected. I currently use it 4-5 nights a week and l think this is one of the, if not the, best retinol products Iu2019ve tried. The texture on my forehead is gone, and the other areas I had issue with has drastically decreased. I can see/feel a huge difference. My skin looks clearer, smoother, and feels great. The only caveat is (and maybe this is just across the board w/retinol, idk) if I donu2019t stay consistent using this, the texture slowly comes back, and my skin feels really dry and flaky. I am aware this is (for me) an expensive product, but the results are there, and I plan to keep using this. Iu2019m very pleased with the performance and have had no problem using this with my other products. I really canu2019t think of a negative, other than price, and if you donu2019t use it regularly you wonu2019t continue to see results sou2026 just keep on using it and your skin will look great! I always follow up with a moisturizer and use a spf 50 during the day if Iu2019ll be outside. Very good quality and hope to try more products from Shani Darden soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first, I received this product for free from Influenster and Shani Darden for my honest review.   When I was sent this product I wondered, u201cWhy use an anti-aging product when Iu2019m not even 30 yet?u201d Well it turns out this was a product I didnu2019t know I needed. Prior to reading the box for this product I knew nothing about retinol which is the primary ingredient in this serum. Anti-aging products were simply well out of my realm of awareness. Retinol is known to reduce fine lines, firm and brighten skin as this product claims to do. I didnu2019t start with many fine lines though I laugh and smile a whole so I canu2019t speak for that but I can say that since incorporating this into my nightmare skincare routine, I have seen a noticeable difference in the bounce of my skin, smoothness overall and brightness. I donu2019t about retinol as a stand-alone but this product is the truth. It is a little high end ringing at $88 a bottle but whatu2019s cheaper this or a facelift? Not to mention the infrequency you use this (1-2 times a week) makes the product stretch. I started testing this product 3 weeks ago (when I took my before photo) and I just recorded my after video right before posting this. Color me impressed. I will gladly spend my money on this product when it runs out. Toodles!

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free on Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I have been using it for about 2 1/2 weeks and so far Iu2019m liking it, but not obsessively loving it. Iu2019m used to retinol products so I jumped in and started using this product nightly rather than easing in to it. So far, I havenu2019t experienced any redness, peeling, dryness, or irritation so that is a positive. The lactic acid in addition to the retinol seems to have made my skin texture a bit smoother as well. Because this retinol formula is so easy to tolerate and the lactic acid is a nice addition, I would consider this a better-than-average retinol product. It absorbs quickly and didnu2019t cause any breakouts, which is also a positive. Iu2019ll need to finish the bottle to see if there are any additional improvement in terms of fine lines, firmness, or other anti-aging benefits. Typically it would take about 6-8 weeks for a skincare product to prove effective, so I may update this after the bottle is finished to determine whether or not I will repurchase on my own.

reviews.review_text: What's not to love?!  I've been using retinol for a while so I'm no newbie to the positive effects it can have on skin. I was using a lower strength formula for some time. The ingredients list looks like a dream with things like fruit extracts, green tea extract, niacinamide, lactobacillus ferment, and rice bran extract. It feels great, and even using it every other day like my old retinol doesn't irritate my skin at all.  Sure, the price point is on the higher side, but the stuff in this product is good, and it's super effective. I definitely recommend trying it out if you're looking for a multi-tasking retinol.

reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  I was thrilled to recieve this product, as I've already been using it in my daily skincare routine for about 2 years. I have super sensitive, breakout-prone skin, and was starting to notice some signs of aging (fine lines, uneven tone, lack of firmness, etc.) as I neared 40. I was nervous starting a retinol, so I started slowly, using it twice a week, and slowly building up to every day use. I did go through a tough 2 month when I started, as with many retinols your skin looks worse before it gets better. I'm glad I stuck with it, as I consider this product a staple in my skincare routine. It retails for ~$88 @sephora. Full disclosure: I also regularly get botox, have gotten filler, and have gone through four RF Microneedling (Morpheus8) treatments, so I consider my current skin to be a reflection of all of those along with this product.

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Shani Darden. As an avid skincare user this Retinol Reform Serum is extremely good. The ultimate multi-tasker tackling fine lines and wrinkles, uneven skin tone, loss of firmness and dark spots.  The Encapsulated Retinol allows for a slow release of the product throughout the night. It also has lactic acid great for gentle exfoliate, Niacinamide to help with skin discoloration and Aloe that helps calm and soothes skin irritation that could be caused by the retinol. I have only been using this product for about 3 weeks I can definitely see a different in my skins firmness and overall health of my skin. Itu2019s gentle enough to use daily, and I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family. I would even purchase this product again as it has become a must have in my nighttime skincare regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  I had really high hopes for this product, but Iu2019ve been somewhat disappointed. In fairness to the product, Iu2019ve only been using it for about 3 weeks, when 12 weeks is recommended. It is a very mild Retinol. It was recommended 1-2 pumps 1-2 days per week to start, followed by moisturizer. I was easily able to use it 4 times per week with no irritation. However, I do not like the smell. It is a bit mildewy and the smell lingers for a while after youu2019ve applied it. I have also not noticed any changes in my fine lines and dark spots. As I said above, I havenu2019t been using it for the full 12 weeks, but I expected to see some difference in a product at this price point. I will edit this post if I see better results in a few weeks, but right now Iu2019d only give this product 2 stars and thatu2019s mainly because itu2019s very gently on the skin.

I only had one day of dryness in 2 weeks and I think is was due to the colder weather that day. I took a before pic but I'm hoping for a little more time to show off my glamorous results. I didn't find it helped with fine lines so far but it's only been about 3 weeks. It definitely helped with my skin tone so far and although it brought out some acne at first , that has cleared. I would recommend this to add to your nightly routine expescially if your worried about over drying which I usually suffer from when using retinol products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free on Influenster and have been testing it on my face for 2 weeks. The redness that I typically experience on my cheeks and under my eyes has greatly improved, and I also noticed that the lines I have on my forehead became smaller over the course of these two weeks. The only reason I gave this four stars instead of five was because my skin became very dry (which it does say can happen on the label - it tells you to use by using 1-2x per week and increase as your skin can handle). I used it 1x the first week and 2x the second week, but noticed this week that my skin really needed a lot of moisture on the days after I used it and does feel a bit tighter and drier than normal. I was not shocked by this, since I have very sensitive skin and my skin is a bit on the drier side. However, I am hopeful that my skin will become used to it as I really think it works very well, and I'm excited to keep on using it to reduce my red/uneven skin tone and forehead lines.

reviews.review_title: Put  your best face forward with Retinol Reform
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve graduated to my mid forties and have noticed my fine lines around my eyes, at my smile, they were become more defined instead of fine lines:  My combination skin, with dry being the biggest contender, was in need of some assistance.  Influencer sent me a free Shani Darden Retinol Reform to review at just  the right time.  Retinol is a scary word and there are safety concerns and instructions addressed on the box and witching the packaging.  I started using the product the very night I received it.  I was pleasantly surprised that my skin instantly felt firmer yet not dry or the u201cstretched to tightu201d feeling that sometimes occurs with creams.  It also didnu2019t feel as if it over compensated the dryness by leaving my skin greasy looking, it could have even been a bit more moisturizing.  Iu2019ve used the Retinol Reform for over two weeks and Iu2019m quite pleased.  My skin feels better, my uneven skin texture had improved greatly, and my fine lines are a little less noticeable.  I am excited to continue using Retinol Reform and seeing what more it can do to improve my face.  Shani Darden Skin Care made a product they should be proud of, it delivers the retinol needed for improvement without being harsh to the skin, even if your skin is a little on the sensitive side like mine, you wonu2019t be let down.  Nobody needs to be in their forties looking like they are over forty, this product can assist in keeping the masses guessing on how you could really be a grandmother.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this retinol reform cream for two weeks. I was afraid it would irritate my skin but thankfully I had no redness or irritation (I have used retinols in the past). My skin seems a bit brighter and make up glides on a bit easier. reviews.review_text: Im really cautious when introducing products like this to my routine. Ive found that lactic acid doesnt really take well on me(if it does, it plateaus and becomes ineffective after awhile - this was true of Sunday Riley's formulation), AHA/BHA's are kind of meh for me, and retinol works, but feels the most abrasive in my experience. I havent sought a treatment like this for quite some time, but when I got some samples of this, I decided to give it a try. Im happy so far. I recently switched up my makeup routine for lighter formulations, so I definitely felt a little more pressured to up the ante on my exfoliation routine - I do have some stubborn textured spots. Im happy to say that after using this for a couple weeks, my makeup looks so much smoother(!) on my face now. Im not sure if I could have achieved that look without it. I will be giving the full size a shot when I finish up all my samples :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Retinol is a vitamin A derivative that works to stimulate the metabolism of skin cells and encourage collagen production. Pinchme sent me a complimentary sample of Shani Dardenu2019s Retinol Reform Serum for product testing purposes. The serum claims to contain 2.2% Encapsulated Retinol and 2% Lactic Acid. This serum helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkle by boosting collagen production. It also brightens and smooths the skin.  I noticed changes in my skin on the second day as  my skin appeared brighter and had a more youthful appearance. By the 4th day I was shook when my skin looked tighter, smoother and a glow from within. Also, my face had a glow to it. This formula is free of Paraben, Phthalates, Gluten, Oils, Sulfates, Fragrances. Also, cruelty-free and vegan. This product has been awarded the Luxury Beauty Award in 2020 by Town and Country and the 2020 Clean Beauty award by Allure. The only Con I see is that the claims of the amount of renitnol do not seem supported by the ingredient list.  I was extremely skeptical about this product as the reviews seemed more like myth than what could be true.  But the reviews are fact.  Get this and give it a try!

reviews.review_text: I'm 38 years old and have aging sensitive dry skin. But my dermatologist recommended that I should try again using retinol and I said I'll think about it because of the disappointment in the past. So I asked some friends what's the best retinol with my skin concerns and I received so many recommendations that I got overwhelmed. I received a sample and was hesitant to go through another frustrating experience but I said you only live once and tried Shani Darden Retinol reform and this is by far the best retinol serum on the skincare market. I've notice my fine lines reduce and smooth and some of my dark spots faded tremendously. There is no scent, easy to apply on your freshly cleanse face and a little goes a long way. I use it 3x times a week I don't want to over do it even though it's doing wonders for my skin. Overall a great product I didn't experience drying my skin out or redness and especially no breakouts Hallelujah. My skin is glowing, clear, smooth and looking younger. I'm thankful for this product and this is a must have in your skin care routine.

reviews.review_text: This review is in partnership with Shani Darden  Iu2019ve been using the Retinol Reform, which has been a much needed addition to my routine as my skin works through another seasonal change. Iu2019m excited to follow up on the longer term changes I see from the retinol, but it also includes 2% lactic acid for gentle exfoliation and itu2019s helping so much with the chin & jaw texture from all my mask wearing (and the warmer weather is creating much more moisture & congestion under the mask). On top of things looking much smoother, I also havenu2019t had the dryness or redness other retinols would sometime cause, and I havenu2019t buffered it with any moisturizers so Iu2019m happy. Iu2019m still using this just about 1x, sometimes 2x a week depending on how my skin feels, and the glow afterwards is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I tried Shani Darden's Retinol Reform Serum. I was super impressed! It was amazing what a noticeable difference there was upon first use! I was able to see a soft glow radiating for my skin! It was finally smooth and bright, and my skin color/tone was finally evened out. To this day I have not been able to find another product that did the same. I was thrilled! Plus, it didn't take long to begin to actually see more changes. My skin simply looked better... healthier. Shani Darden's Retinol Reform Serum is truly remarkable. It does not contain parabens, gluten, fragrances or surface oils. All of this contributing to reduce the visible signs of aging. I believe this serum is best used at night, on clean & dried skin before evening moisturizing. I strongly suggest to any and everyone who has anti-aging issues to try this. It did not disappoint me and I don't think it will you either!

Boy was I wrong! It has helped to calm down my acne breakouts as well as reduce fine lines on my face. I have also noticed some of my older acne scars aren't there any longer. I haven't tried other retinol products to say this one works better than another or not, but what I do know is this stuff really works. I would recommend to anyone getting older that isnt happy with the texture or look of their skin.

reviews.review_title: Good, but there is better out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a nice retinol - I finished a bottle of this after 5 months of use. I stepped up to this after using a full bottle of her Texture Reform. It wasn't harsh on my skin and for sure helped calm down incoming zits, reduced the appearance of fine lines on my forehead and helped overall with my texture. I used this 4x a week. That being said, do I think it's worth the price? Meh. I moved on to another brand (starting low and slow) and I've had way better results in the first 4 weeks of using the new brand. The new retinol is also less expensive with decades of research and data to back it up. I do think this product is worth it for maintenance purposes and would repurchase in the future for use in the warmer months and reserve my stronger retinol for the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While this is an award winning retinol product, for me it was just average.  I have used products that worked better, and I have used products that burned my face. For the price, I expected more than my current (and slightly cheaper) retinol product.  I did not experience any burning, nor did any of my dark spots fade.  My skin felt smooth, so that was a pro.  In the end, I felt as though this was just a pricy moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So it says right on the bottle not for sensitive skin and they mean it.  The ingredients sound amazing, but if you are prone to irritation from retinol and chemical exfoliants be very careful with this product. Iu2019m pretty experienced with both, and Iu2019ve never developed this kind of stinging, redness and flaking after ONE use.  Ingredients and formulation are high qualityu2014this is a powerful retinol serum and Iu2019m sure a holy grail for some. But if you have dry or even the slightest bit sensitized skin, mixing lactic acid with retinol might wreak havoc on your skin like it did mine. Not worth trying to build up a tolerance for me, just going to stick with gentler products.

reviews.review_title: Great for uneven skin tone, only a little drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform 2 times per week for almost 6 weeks. I have noticed my skin tone looks more even and, while I don't have many fine lines, those I do have appear softened. I was not able to scale up my usage, however, due to dryness. This could be caused by the unseasonably cold weather and the effect of constantly running the heather to stay warm. I have tried to increase my use of the humidifier to offset this but could still only tolerate 2x per week. I liked how easy it was to smooth on my skin and did not find the product to be greasy. I do not suffer from breakouts in general and did not have any problems with acne while using this product. I would probably purchase again, maybe in warmer weather and especially if they offered a more moisturizing version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used numerous retinol products (including prescription) and I have to say that I really like the Shani Darden retinol reform. I think it helped my texture more than any other product I've used in the past, perhaps that's the lactic acid in it, but it's nice to have it already in this so I don't have to purchase and use an additional product. I cant honestly say that I've noticed an improvement in any existing spots because I've been using azealic acid for about 2 months before I started using this and I didn't notice any additional improvement from what I had been seeing with the azealic acid already. as for anti aging, fine lines are not currently an issue so I had nothing to compare to before. with all that said this does have a high price point BUT they offer a deluxe sample size that offers what I think is more than enough to see if it will work for you before committing to a larger, pricier size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The greatest retinol product EVER. Works great for textural issues and signs of aging. Leaves you with a young, fresh glow! Iu2019m so happy to see that Shani has changed her packaging. So sleek! Get this. Donu2019t even question it. You wonu2019t regret it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy with SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM. It had a light sting when applying but I take that as something is working (was not painful).  I definitely would recommend this product, especially to us young 40ish year olds.  I just wish I would have taken before and after pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! Only negative is it has a very strong smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Shani Darden Retinol Reform Serum!  It is a nice thick consistency, and absorbs quickly into your face. There are no added fragrances which I like, it just smells like Retinol.  I also think itu2019s great that itu2019s cruelty free, vegan, oil free, and fragrance free. I think itu2019s a great multitasking serum, because it targets so many skin issues at once.  Itu2019s helped to smooth out my fine lines on my face, my skin looks more radiant, and itu2019s helped to clear up my blemishes. I have relatively sensitive skin, and this serum didnu2019t bother it at all, like some other Retinols. Iu2019ve been using it every other day for a few weeks now, and am very pleased with my results. I most definitely would recommend this serum, if youu2019re in the market for healthier and more radiant younger looking skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not irritate my skin and seemed to work well. I noticed my skin was brighter pretty quickly after starting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The serum left my skin feeling smooth. It didn't irritate my skin. It was easy to spread on the face and it absorbed very quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden Retinol Reform is the only retinol product that has made a real difference for me. It's 2021, and let's face it that no one will usually see your full face outside of a private home. I'm an 8 hour shift mask-wearer, and I don't need to look great at my age in the middle of the muck, but to keep my skin from full breakouts and the congestion without any real irritation or excess flaking - I'm impressed. The last thing you want is to see yourself with bad skin when you finally get it off, and it's more radiant than before winter, even though I still feel like junk. I would love more time to see if how long term, well ventilated faces respond but I am so happy to still look like myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product! Iu2019ve been using this product for the last 3 weeks and I see a major difference in my fine lines. Love how it moisturized my skin with out giving me any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream ever! Iu2019m 32 and I was using Sunday Riley good genes. My dark spots were not going away so I wanted to step up in my routine because of my age and because and dark spots. This cream is amazing, in three days my dark spots are lighter and my skin looks young!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden Skin Care has help me out a lot for moisturizing my skin. I could see the difference in the fine wrinkles after using the product for abourt three weeks. This product absorbs in my skin well and I had no break out with the product. I will recommend to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Works so well, made my forehead 10,000 times better looking than before!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this Shani Darden Retinol Reform product for a few weeks and definitely saw some improvement in fine lines. I would say I noticed a minor improvement in texture as well. I experienced a little bit of sensitivity but nothing too extreme. I am excited to see what a difference this will make after longer use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Shani Darden product was great. Minimal skin brightening on my cheeks after a couple of weeks. A little irritation with the first use but no further irritation after that.  I would recommend this product to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product because it will leave my skin very smooth and you don't really have to use a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the samples for 3 days straight. This actually got rid of the small white heads that were forming on my forehead. It reduced the size of the large red pimple on my chin. Iu2019m not sure if it did much for the blackheads on my nose. This is fragrance free, so this has a strong smell (itu2019s tolerable though)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product every day. It made my skin feel moisturized and soft. I would recommend to family and friends.

reviews.review_title: The product is fine, but it didn't do much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product as recommended, 2 times a week and if my skin could handle it, slowly build op. I went to using it 3 times a week in my nighttime routine. I have fine wrinkles and after using it for 4 weeks, I did not see much of a change. But I guess, it takes time! The product itself comes in a very handy bottle with pump, the amount that comes out of the bottle per pump is good. And it has a nice smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for about 2 weeks to start to see if there was a difference. I have some fine lines and sun spots I would like to take care of. I like this product so far- it didn't break me out, and I think that is it helping to make my fine lines disappear a bit. My sun spots still show up around my undereye area..but hopefully they will look more faded after using the product for a longer amount of time. There is a nice scene but it isn't too overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the Shani Darden Retinol Reform is a pretty great product. I've used it for a few weeks every few days and my skin does feel a bit softer and brighter overall. I haven't seen much change in the dark/sun spots but I think that takes more time as has been my experience with other retinol creams. There is a scent... I don't love it... BUT what I do love is that it's not overly fragrant. This doesn't feel perfumey at all... might just be the smell from all the ingredients combined. Overall I would recommend it and will continue to apply it to my skin for longer lasting results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM for about 3 weeks. I am happy with the results so far. My pores seem to be less noticeable and the dark blemishes on my face are fading. I am definitely going to keep using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product twice weekly for 2 weeks to avoid any skin reactions due to usual skin sensitivity. I did not experience any adverse reactions. I also, however, did not see any significant difference in my skin during this time. The product is light and doesn't feel like it clogs poors. With time, I'm hoping to see more noticeable results.

reviews.review_title: Not bad for the first time using retinol.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Shani Darden Retinol Reform Serum for two weeks. I only used it a couple days out of the week at first to get used to it because I didn't want it to make my skin red. I found it did not have any negative effects to my skin. It was easy to apply and absorbs quickly into skin. In the time I used it, I've noticed my skin appear smoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM didn't give me any break outs or skin irritation. I didn't really notice too much of a difference other than my face looked a little brighter after using a couple weeks. I've been using retinol for about 10 years, so my skin is seasoned to it. I like that this particular one is above 2 percent. It goes on nicely and doesn't leave my face greasy or overly dry. Lactic acid is a nice added benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product!  I havenu2019t used a retinol before so I was cautious and only used it twice a week at first.  My skin isnu2019t sensitive so I was able to up it to every third day.  My skin has been so soft, supple and glowing!  Very nice, lotion-like consistency and no noticeable scent in my opinion.  My husband and daughters have all commented that my skin looks super youthful.  I am very happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t like writing bad reviews, but I just didnu2019t see this product making improvement in my skin after a month of religious use. Iu2019m a licensed esthetician and I know that retinol usually helps, but for me, at this price point I wouldnu2019t recommend. Hope it helps for others! Everyoneu2019s skin is different :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform. This product comes in a slender palm size container with an easy to use pump style dispenser. The use of this product must be built up over time. Starting out with a couple days a week and adding additional days as your skin grows used to the serum. I applied to clean skin as directed twice a week and have noticed a smoother texture to my skin. I look forward to seeing how the texture changes with additional use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product did not work for me. I did not see any noticeable difference between prior use and after using Retinol Reform. It was  easy to use. There was no unpleasant fragrance. I believe that if I was to use the product longer it would work. I did not have any dryness or irritation from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Shani Darden Retinol Reform Serum for a little over two weeks now. I used it a couple days a week at first until I was able to work up to everyday. My skin did not have any adverse effects. The bottle has a convenient pump that helps to control how much you are using. The serum was easy to apply and absorbs quickly into my skin. It did not leave my skin feeling sticky or greasy.  I did not care for the smell and used it at night, before bed. I did notice that it brightened my skin over the time I have been using it, making it look smoother. It also has given me a more youthful appearance.  I will continue to use it for the next 8 weeks to get the full effects as it can take up to 12 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few months now and my pores have been noticeably less visable. It's a highly effective product and doesnt irritate my skin like other retinol products seem to. Definitely recommend this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using for almost a month now, started off slow just to be sure it wouldn't irritate my skin. So far my brown spots haven't really changed, my acne however has started to heal faster and look better! I like how it feels when I apply it, it isn't to thick but just right. Certain spots do feel a little dry but nothing a little moisturizer can't help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using the Shani Darden Retinol Reform product.  I found that it left my skin soft and smoother than usual.  I was able to use it nightly without irritation. The smell was a bit off putting but not so much that I wasn't able to use it. I think using it long term would be helpful for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture was great; not too thick or sticky feeling like some. The scent was not my favorite. But honestly, once itu2019s on, I couldnu2019t even smell it  it wasnu2019t overwhelming at all. I started using 2 times a week and worked up to every day pretty quickly with no irritation. I noticed a huge difference in my skin texture immediately when waking up and overall tone has improved within a few weeks. I did not even need to use a moisturizer on top. It didnu2019t dry my skin out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM is awesome, after using it for a couple of weeks I can totally see and feel the difference on my skin, my skin feels very soft and smooth, my skin texture looks more even, and my fine lines decreased, this serum absorbs fast and doesn't give a feeling greasy on my skin, just amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Retinol Reform by Shani Darden for the last three weeks, and so far so good. It is not drying like many other retinol products I've tried, and has a great consistency for application. I also appreciate that it doesn't have a strong smell, which I hate in facial products.  I haven't seen any changes in my skin texture, dark spots or fine lines yet, but it really hasn't been long enough to tell if it will make a significant difference over time. Lastly, I really appreciate that this product is cruelty-free.

reviews.review_title: Works well on dry winter skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo almost middle aged skin which tends to get more dry throughout the cold ND winters.  I started using the retinol every couple nights during the winter and gradually worked my way up to 5 nights a week.  It does on the skin smoothly and I had NO redness or irritation at all.  This is a first for my skin while using a new retinol product.  I can't speak to the sun sensitivity because it was far too cold to spend much time outside.  I did notice a small difference in 3 weeks before I ran out of product.  The smell and color are a little different (not my fav) but it wasn't a deal breaker.  Overall, worked well on my skin and would purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many retinol serums and by far the Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform is one of my favorites. I could see the difference a little over a week of trying it.I love how it left my face feeling smooth and not dry also.My friend asked me what the new makeup I was using because my skin looked great I told her the same kind she uses.She now wants the Shani Darden Skin Reform .I am so thankful I got to try this free sample from PinchMe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful!  I have found that my skin is very soft and supple after using. I have seen a diminish in my fine lines and age spots are fading!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence with this product. The Shani Dardin Retinol Reform surprised me with not being an oily product. I highly recommend using a good SPF sunscreen with any retinol cream. I really saw improvements on my dark circles being lightened up and the start of crows feet disappearing. Unfortunately on the second day I got raised irritated bumps underneath my eyes and on my cheeks. Although it wasn't the best product for me, I think a lot of you ladies will like the light weight feel of this retinol reform.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product I was weary that it may be too much for my dry-prone skin, especially during the winter months. However, this product is worth all the rage that it has been receiving. I noticed the scar over my left eye starting somewhat fading and not being nearly as obvious. I have received numerus compliments on my skin for looking healthy. My complexation looks terrific overall. It has an  even tone touched with a nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product, as a sample, but not the price! I actually loved the texture, being smooth and creamy. Not so thick that you run out fast because u canu2019t get it on a portion of you face bigger than a nickel, hate that! Didnu2019t really notice any changes but I donu2019t think you can reverse aging without surgery lol. I think it would be a great aging defense. I would totally buy this! But now that I see the price, there are cheaper products with exactly the same results, just saying, if you can afford it buy it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing Product! Results of this was visible after about 2 weeks of continuous use. Goes on smooth and not greasy at all. Dark spots on my face are fading away and some lines! By far the best product if you have any of these issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It works well. I enjoyed the smell and the texture was nice. Need to wait a bit before adding a moisturizer which I got better results from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Shani Darden Retinol Reform several times a week for a few weeks now. This is my first time using retinol so I wasnu2019t sure what to expect. Iu2019m not sure how much itu2019s visibly changed the appearance of my face overall but my skin does feel much smoother and less oily. It has helped with breakouts as well. I will continue to use and see how my skin progresses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Shani Darden Retinol Reform for almost 3 weeks, and the results are amazing! I noticed a difference after the first use. My skin is significantly smoother and clearer. My foundation is much easier to apply. I absolutely love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Shani Darden's Retinol Reform as a free sample from PinchME and I had never heard about this brand but I'm always up for any retinol out there. It worked as expected however 10ml are nothing when you have a big round face so I decided to use it only in my eyes. Even though I have very oily eyelids it worked very well and did not make them oilier or caused any breakouts. I'm very pleased with how it performs but since I am new to the product I don't know if the fragrance free feature is a real thing or if the product I got was rancid because it smelled like an old perfume that has been sitting on your granny's table for years, thats how i can describe and it did not harm my eyes or anything so I've kept using it but I think I will forever wonder what should it really smell like... or not smell like. Overall, I give thisp roduct 4 stars just because of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It works as expected, you donu2019t need a lot just pump a small amount and use on clean face and just let it do itu2019s Magicu2019s, I saw some significant changes in my skin texture and look after using it for a while, I do recommend it for all skin tone and it worked well with my oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, kind to skin. My skin is clear, bright, smooth and I have less acne over all. Iu2019d recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could tell a difference in my skin in the first week. I love using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, pump gives a small amount of yellow product. Does not smell great. I prefer oil retinol as it provided more coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Shani Darden Skin Care Retinal Reform as a trial product from PinchMe. I have been using it regularly and I have noticed a direct improvement in my skin. It is an enjoyable consistency and the product goes on well and soaks in well. I have noticed an improvement in the fine line and textures in my skin, and I think that this has been especially nice during the winter months when I have been testing it. If you are looking for an effective retinol cream, this one is definitely effective, The only reason I did not rate it a full 5 stars is because I think the price is too high for the amount you receive - you only need a small amount, and that small amount goes a long way, but $88/1 oz is very steep. With that said, however, it does definitely work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful! Iu2019ve used retinol cream before without seeing much improvement, a bit smoother skin but no real difference. But Shani Darden Retinol Reform does so much more! Not only did my skin feel much smoother, my fine lines now look much softer and more subtle. Happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very soft and easy to apply.  Dries quickly and sets up for moisturizer.  I can tell that my skin is more hydrated and I have less fine lines after about a month.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow the Shani Darden Retinol Reform serum did not disappoint! It is not greasy or heavy on my skin and smells fantastic,Almost feels like i am wearing nothing,My skin also doesn't feel sticky afterwards.Will continue using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product every night makes my skin look glowing and youthful definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: saw a difference within a few days! it practically erased my fine lines around my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM!  My skin looked much smoother and healthier after using this product.  I really liked the results that I got from using this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this retinol serum because it works well for me. After using for few weeks i am very impressed it does help skin looks clear and smooth. I have dry dull skin and using this serum twice a day helped my skin rejuvenate. It is little expensive for me so i might or not buy but i will definitely recommend to others who can afford the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM is a great retinol serum that performed well compared to other retinol serums I've used in the past. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes smells like vinegar to me. But it works great. although the product seems to work well, it smells absolutely awful. The scent dissipates after a while, it is hard to get over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform for 4 weeks now, 2x a week. It goes on smooth and absorbs well in my skin. At first, I thought that the product seems a little small but a little amount of it goes a long way. I did not notice any redness on my skin. I also did not notice any tingling on application. I layer a moisturizer from a different brand, and both work well together on my skin. My skin has been suffering from winter dryness and dullness and I noticed that my face looks brighter. I will continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed a difference with one use! I'm always looking for fine lines and wrinkle treatment and the retinol reform exceeded my expectations! I love the pump action, it makes for super easy application and the formula smooths over the skin nicely. I'm adding this to my bathroom staples list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks great after using this retinol cream. Iu2019ve noticed a difference in my skin. Canu2019t wait to see how the long term effects are on my skin. Smell is great and not overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample from pinchme. I have been using for about 3 weeks. It's very lightweight I can tell my pores are smaller. I will definitely purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Should be called magic cream! Reluctant at first because of the price, but worth every cent! Skin is smooth and soft and wrinkles around eyes have lightened up after just a few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Shani Darden Retinol Reform with lactic acid twice a day for two weeks and have noticed that my facial skin is very soft. reviews.review_title: Did not live up to expectations
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Shani Darden retinol reform for about a month and just havenu2019t seen the results I expected. My skin does seem *slightly* brighter, and I havenu2019t had a problem with dryness/skin flaking, so thereu2019s that, but honestly I didnu2019t see the results I thought I would. I wouldnu2019t buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like using this retinol product for my maskne more than anything right now. I also am hoping it will help with my melasma over continued usage but after 3 weeks of using it I can tell it is helping with my maskne that I have been majorly fighting on my chin. I have used this 2x a week for 3-4 weeks now and can tell a difference in smoothness. I do have somewhat sensitive skin and after one application I got too close to the corners of my eyes and it dried out my skin and left it red and dry for about a week. I now use it strickly on my chin, forehead, and my under eye for melasma and haven't had any issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this formula and the fact it combines both retinol and AHAs, brilliant!! I already have a holy grail retinol product (Paulau2019s Choice) that I use religiously as often as my skin can tolerate it, usually 3-4 nights per week. On non retinol nights I tend to use AHA serums, for the chemical exfoliation. I love having the option of using a more gentle retinol formula that includes AHAs... this is where Retinol Reform steps in. Reform is a more gentle formula, but still very effective. I love alternating Reform with a stronger retinol formula throughout the week. And Reform having AHA chemical exfoliants is a huge plus! My skin tolerates Reform well, Iu2019ve never had a negative reaction or irritation. After using I wake up to smoother and brighter skin. This product is on the pricier side but itu2019s a lovely formula and a definite repurchase for me. Love that Shani offers a smaller size to trial for only $30. For reference I am 43 with sensitive combo/dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from pinchme. It's very lightweight and smooth. made my skin feel tighter and smoother and also decreased my pore size! made me look young. i would love to buy this again.

reviews.review_title: 5 star ratings are for the old formula :( not this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the trial size of this to give it a shot since the reviews were great. The bottle was hard to get anything out of but that wasnu2019t the issue. The issue is that this doesnu2019t do anything to your skin! I didnu2019t see any results after going through the tester. Itu2019s been a few months now and Iu2019m convinced the glowing reviews on here are for the older formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my skin feel very smooth and healthy. The serum is very lightweight, it goes on easily and absorbs quickly into the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a free sample from pinchme to try and I'm not completely sold. I enjoy it doesnt have a scent as most thing will give me issues when its overly scented. I also love that the pump doesnt over shoot so I know the reccomended amount to use. I just havent noticed a difference since using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of anti-aging serums, drugstore and department store. I've seen a bigger improvement with SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM, than any of the other products I have used! It absorbs so quickly. You can follow it up immediately with a moisturizer. My skin looks so much plumper and smoother. I'm so glad that I found this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not surprised that this product is 100% out of stock right now - it is THAT AMAZING. Shani Darden Retinol Reform is hands down one of the best anti-aging serums I have EVER used (and I've used a ton of different brands). It goes on smoothly, doesn't smell super chemically (like some retinol/anti-aging products do, and didn't irritate my skin at ALL. In fact, this product is so phenomenal that it's prompted me to purchase their eye cream as well. I would 100% recommend Shani Darden Skin Care - Retinol Reform to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did experienced some mild dryness in the beginning so definitely start slow (every other night) and let your skin adjust accordingly. Other than that it's been great so far at keeping my skin smooth and in good shape! This serum is lightweight and sinks in quickly, leaving a smooth finish that's good to layer with my moisturizer. It does have a long list of ingredients including several plant extracts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reformu00ae through PINCHme and Oh My Gosh.  As a woman in my late 30s I can already see improvements after only a couple of weeks, and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin at all.  Will definitely be buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in my almost mid 30u2019s a d have been super aware that my skin is starting to age. Using a retinol product is important for those fine wrinkles. I have fair skin but itu2019s not sensitive and this product didnu2019t cause any irritation. My skin is looking fresh and I love it so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a long time shani retinol reform user and let me tell you.. there IS a difference in the old formula vs. the one in sephora stores now. The old formula - absolute magic. Minimal ingredient list, I could use it EVERYWHERE. Eyes included. I woke up feeling like a newborn baby after retinol nights. The new formula - lacking that magic that took Shani to the top. The ingredient list is double the size and retinol is pushed further down the list, I can't use it around my eyes anymore as I got horrible dry, scaly patches and some on my forehead as well. I was in such denial I blamed it on every other product except shani's because I was that sure she wouldn't do us like that. I still use the product and I'm giving it a 4 because it's still a good product but it's the same as every other retinol now. Sigh* I wish people would stop messing with beautiful formulas just to make it mainstream. I would've paid double the price if she had kept the OG ingredient list and sold as an independent retailer. I know it's all politricks in the beauty industry but this was a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works great for fine line and wrinkles. In just 2 weeks, I was already noticing a difference. It is also great to fix uneven skin tone, and dullness. Highly Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The improvements I saw in mere days were subtle in and of themselves: the sort of thing that I notice when I've spent a little too much time with my magnifying mirror. But they amalgamated to a very obvious boost to my overall complexion. The teeny whispers of forehead lines that I had first noticed a few months prior all but dissolved entirely. The stubborn acne scar on my chin disappeared within a week. There's an overall brightness to my skin that has edged me from using minimal foundation to ditching it altogether.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 2 weeks and didn't really notice any change, so I waited and used it for another 2 weeks.  I would say that it seemed to help my skintone look more even, but I didn't notice any differences with wrinkles.  Maybe with some more time, it would!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product, but no where on the description or ingredient list does it say do not use if breastfeeding. So I bought it and now canu2019t use it. But if you are selling the product, customers should be able to read all the info they need about it on your website.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Shani Darden's retinol reform was amazing and super effective.   My skin is radiant.   I wake up to glowing skin.  Right now I'm doing it every other day but I may try to do 6 days a week like Shani Darden does herself....gradually increase it. reviews.review_text: So I am a huge fan of retinol and use it daily in my skin care routine. I wanted to give this one a try so I jumped on it. Letu2019s just dive right in. For the price and quantity of the product I just am not a fan in that aspect either. For $30 I can get triple the amount in Olay retinol/moisturizer and itu2019s feels amazing! I noticed my skin significantly brighter after just a couple uses(twice per week to be exact & what is recommended), and within a few more uses I noticed the smaller, fine lines/wrinkles diminishing on my cheeks and forehand. Thank God. Overall SO much smoother. I am interested to try more products from this brand. It is rather pricey, but you can't complain much, when a product actually works like this!  Spectacular find!

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love this product, didn't work for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used a sample size of this product 0.3 fl oz Shani Darden Retinol Reform as instructed. Started 1-2 nights a week, then 3 nights a week, etc., building up days till product was empty. I suffer from horrible hormonal acne, uneven skin tone, dark spots & fine lines/wrinkles.  I turned 50 in July 2020. Unfortunately I didn't notice any difference in my complexion after using this product for several weeks. I was very surprised because I have had success with other products. This seems to have worked wonders for some people. Just didn't do the trick for me for some reason. Glad I was able to try the sample without spending a fortune on the full size. Hope other people have success with this item. I love recommending great products that boost my confidence because acne is no picnic and I've lived with it my entire life and know how tramatic it can be.

reviews.review_title: The star of the Shani Darden line
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely a staple product. It makes your skin look amazing. This is also the only retinol that I have used that does not cause my eczema to flair up on my neck (and Iu2019ve tried a lot). For years I had been neglecting my neck and now I am so happy that I can carry my skincare down to my neckline again. I was so happy with this product, I went ahead and purchased all the other products in her line (cleanser, toner and moisturizer). I figured the retinol reform was so amazing, the other products had to be game changers as well. I was wrong. The toner almost undid all the work the retinol reform did in about 3 days of use. My face was breaking out terribly. I stopped using it, and my skin is almost back to looking perfect after a week. The cleanser is VERY basic. Nothing bad to say, but certainly not life changing. I thought I would love the moisturizer because itu2019s oil free and my skin gets greasy fast- but it contains dimethicone and you can FEEL it. That slick silicone feel- I donu2019t like that in a primer so I definitely donu2019t want it in my moisturizer. The other products will be returned. Retinol Reform is a keeper. If you feel tempted to use the whole line, or if you think you need to, Iu2019m here to tell you that you will see amazing results with JUST this product.

reviews.review_title: Longtime Retinol User & I LOVE This
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using retinol in my skincare routine for over 2 years and I know how important it is. When I started using Shani Darden, I worked my way up to applying it every other day and was careful when introducing my skin to a new product. I started with once a week, then twice a week, and now every other day. Maybe it was that, or maybe just the way it's formulated, but I saw no irritation at all. Which is HUGE when you have skin that tends to be more sensitive like mine.  As with all retinol formulas, it does take a while to work so be patient. I have been using this for over 2 months and am starting to see my skin become more supple and my acne scars are fading. The serum lasts a long time and lives up to the hype.   *I received this product in partnership with Sephora + Shani Darden*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested Shaniu2019s Retinol Reform for 30 days, itu2019s a 2.2% encapsulated Retinol which is stronger than the Texture Reform as it utilizes Retinol. Encapsulation protects the integrity of the retinol as it slowly releases and enables deeper penetration, avoiding superficial skin irritation. Even though I was slightly weary of the 2.2% as it is relatively high for a retinol, I experienced no sensitivity, no retinization side effects like flaking, irritation, redness, stinging, dryness. I was able to use this every single night with no issues. Iu2019m a seasoned retinoid user and know my skin well enough to know what I can handle. I loved the healthier glow  and hydration my skin experienced after the first week, noticeably less sebaceous filaments and keratin plugs on my nose. The added 2% Lactic acid which helps exfoliate the skin gently, while simultaneously hydrates. I loved the combination of these 2 ingredients. The texture of this is like a lightweight gel moisturizer, it absorbs rapidly. I would recommend this product for someone who wants a gentle retinol, not quite ready for a RX tretinoin. I would also repurchase and use when Iu2019m off of RX tret as I could use SD retinol reform daily unlike my tretinoin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this retinol in partnership with Shani Darden. This is my honest review after using it for 30 days: It feels much gentler than other retinols. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a retinol product so you're not using it to see immediate results - any reviews who say otherwise are mistaken or uninformed about what retinol actually does. This is a long term game, but consistency and a good product will pay off. I went through a bottle of this over the last ~4 months and here are my thoughts on what I liked but also why I won't be repurchasing it.  Pros: I have combination skin that is extremely sensitive and reactive and had no redness or other problems with using this product almost every night, however I've been using retinol products for two years. My routine after applying a retinol cream is to follow with CereVe PM moisturizer (my go-to but to each their own) 10-20 minutes after. I never experienced any dryness.  Cons: Unfortunately, like many companies, SD doesn't tell you what the percentage of retinol is in this product. For this reason, I won't be buying it again - it's just too expensive to cross your fingers that you're getting enough for it to make a difference.   I will be going back to retinol products that list the % and hope more companies take note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this retinol. Effective but also gentle. I use this 3x a week and can see such a difference in my skin! I highly recommend if you are looking for a great retinol product!
