reviews.review_text: This retinol is so gentle!! If youu2019ve had bad experience with retinol in the past, I would highly suggest looking into this one! This formula is very gentle and hydrating. I use 2 pumps in my PM routine and follow up with moisturizer and SPF (very important especially when using retinol!). Iu2019ve been using this product 3x a week and really been loving it! I noticed a big difference with my hyperpigmentation and overall improved the appearance of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most gentle retinols I have ever used! I started using this and have never experienced any dryness or irritation using it like I have with other retinols. I was able to start using it 2x a week which is something Iu2019ve never been able to do with any other product. The texture is like a light moisturizer which is great for being able to avoid areas of the face like the lips and also helps it not be so drying. Itu2019s fragrance free which is great if your sensitive to fragrance like I am.  It seems to be working well for me but itu2019s hard to say since I use retinol mostly as a preventative.  The packaging is really nice. Itu2019s a thick glass jar that has an amazing pump. It dispenses product gently rather than being violent when you press the pump. Iu2019m really impressed by this retinol overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried some other cult-favorite retinols and they just don't do what this retinol does. It is super gentle on my extremely sensitive skin, it is fairly moisturizing as most retinols dry out your skin, and insanely effective. Many of the bad reviewers of this product say they broke out after a few days or that their skin didn't adjust to the product after a few weeks. If you are serious about getting on a retinol regimen and you have done your research about the topic, then you know it takes about 12 weeks of retinol treatment for a noticeable change to occur (as it takes approximately 12 weeks for your skin cells to turn over with or without retinol). My fellow retinol researchers out there also know that after beginning a retinol regimen, there is a purging period where the retinol makes all the gross stuff under your skin comes to the surface to get rid of it! After the 12-week period is over is when your skin transforms. This particular product has a higher % of retinol than most others and is also, as I said, super gentle, so you can build up to everyday use in just about a week and maximize results. The price isn't even that bad in comparison and there is enough in the bottle to last a while. I've made all my friends and family get on this retinol and I highlyyyyy recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this retinol! Iu2019m an esthetician and have tried a lot of retinols on the market. I love that my skin doesnu2019t need to adjust to it too much. My over all complexion and skincare is so much more even. If youu2019re nervous about trying retinol start here you wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m on my second bottle and I have been using it for several months. This retinol-lactic acid serum is hands down, my favorite! Between wearing sunscreen, face masks, etc, my skin/pores tend to start looking congested and I have been having some acne issues. This serum seriously clears up the congestion and blemishes overnight, it IS that miracle serum you need. It has given me the glowiest skin!u2063 u2063

You guys, this thing is magic. Forget about using lactic acid and retinol on separate nights and having to buy two products. This formula uses a stable 2.2% Encapsulated Retinol combined with 2% lactic acid to boost collagen and cell turnover.   This is the SMOOTHEST retinol that has ever graced my face. I had previously alternated between two other retinol. One had a thick chalky feeling and the other left my face feeling burned with just 1% retinol. reviews.review_text: I just want to warn everyone with clear skin who have had history of acne to stay far from this product I initially purchased this retinol to hopefully get rid of a few dark spots and it has now been 3 months and I have not recovered from using this product I hope one day I will but itu2019s been very hard Iu2019ve tried everything apparently with retinol some not all people experience a purging process when causes you to break out as part of the u201ccell turnoveru201d you would think maybe if you stop the product the acne would go away but it doesnu2019t !! So I hear you have to keep using the product in order to stop breaking out I just feel the process is way too long and not worth it in my opinion I would suggest if youu2019re trying to get rid of dark spots stick to something like a vitamin C more gentle because itu2019s not fun at all :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: feels great going on with no burn or anything but unfortunately this broke me out every time I used it. every.time. made zero difference in my skin otherwise too. it's a shame because my aging skin was prepared to fall in love with this cult favorite. on to the next product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best retinol I have ever tried! I suffer from acne (in my 30s...great) and my skin has cleared up and has stayed clear for months. Most of my skincare products are from Drunk Elephant but this blows their retinol out of the water.

reviews.review_title: Dark spots/Age spots/ dull and uneven at mid-40u2019s
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do love this retinol product, but have only been using it for the past 45 days, but not daily yet.   I am slowly building up (currently using it 2- 3X/week). For that reason, I am going to give it a score of 4 stars for now as I think it has definitely more benefits if used daily (or at least 5x/ wk min). I purchased this product after doing my research  and based on great reviews. I am in my mid 40, and was concerned with post inflammatory hyperpigmentation/dark or age spots/uneven skin tone and dullness. I have definitely seen improvement in reduction of acne breakouts(I havenu2019t had since starting retinol use), and since acne always caused post inflammatory hyperpigmentation on my skin, that has been a great benefit. Also the PIH I already had is definitely lighter, skin is brighter and skin is more even and smoother. Pretty good for 2-3X/week usage. Will write another review once I am using it daily.  Note: I did have to find an effective moisturizer bc my skin that has always been dry became dryer. I am using skinceuticals triple lipid and it works wonderfully with retinol!!!!  Also MUST use sunscreen daily that is at least SPF 40 and up, and use hats or not expose skin in the sun too long!!! Retinol makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.  Picture on left is before, on right is 1 month later

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful retinol! My skin has significantly improved with no irritation. I highly recommend this product! It's magic!

reviews.review_title: worse breakout of my life (not just a purge)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this. I decided to try at the start of quarantine because what better time to start a new skincare routine, especially with retinol (purging,etc). Iu2019m In my 30s and still get a few hormonal breakouts but nothing crazy so when I read that this was for breakouts and early signs of aging I was pretty excited. I started breaking out worse than a 16 year old about 2 weeks in.. I was devastated, embarrassed, but forced myself to press on because I figured it was a really bad purge. After about 2 months of continual breakouts (Iu2019ve never in my life had breakouts on my forehead until using this) I started using it just a couple days a week, still determined things would get better. Fast forward to the 4th month and I can honestly say my skin has never been worse. I never even broke out like this in my teens. Seeing as this was the only tangible change Iu2019m giving up in hopes by skin will go back to normal. Iu2019ve read she changed the ingredients when she made it cheaper.. sucks because I heard it used to be a good product before adding pore clogging fillers. Donu2019t disregard the negative reviews, a purge shouldnu2019t last over 6 weeks.. this product was horrible for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a difference in my skin texture, fine lines and sun damage!! recommend 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can already see a HUGE difference in my forehead fine lines since using this product every night (been using it for a couple of weeks now). Even someone else commented on how much better my fine lines look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed smoothness in the texture of skin within a week of using the product every night. Would definitely repurchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used so many other retinols (Murad, Drunk Elephant, Sunday Riley) and this one is the absolute best. It doesn't irritate my skin and leave me dry like the others. When I use this at night I don't even need to apply additional moisturizer. It is SO hydrating. I stopped using it for a week and my skin looked dull. I am addicted. Skin is clear, smaller pores, fewer fine lines and I have a total glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used it several times, a large sample. My skin feels soft and looks radiant and plump in the morning, no irritation or peeling. Fine lines are smoother too. It does increase sensitivity to sun so extra sunblock is a must! Will be purchasing a full size to use about 2-3 times a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a great product. It has helped diminish my acne and acne scars. Worth the price! Going to buy it again once finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used retionals before but this formulation just made me break out really bad and made problems worse. I don't really have sensitive skin and this product extremely irritated me, wasn't good for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited to buy this during the Rouge Sale. I just turned 28 and wantEd to get ahead of the game so I decided to try this retinol out, even tho I have *knock on wood* perfect, clear skin. Biggest mistake. I researched and found out that my skin will purge first couple of times of using, so I gave it a pass. I would use it and the next day wake up a gigantic cystic pimple. And not just one.. a few. For someone who rarely breaks out, this was traumatic. These pimples have now turned into scars and Iu2019m trying to get rid of the marks now. Itu2019s been a month and a half and Iu2019m still breaking out heavily after every use. Not a fan... canu2019t wait to return to sephora. Iu2019ll buy the Dr.DennisGross peels to help get my skin to back to where it was before this retinol. I shouldu2019ve sadly read the reviews before purchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne scars redness & sensitive skin this product (& I only have a sample size) has decreased the redness overnight! I mixed it with drunk elephant b-hydra serum & the ordinary niacinamide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many serums in my life and this one is useless. I donu2019t see any change to my skin at all. It didnu2019t make me break out, but it also had no improvement to my skin. I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first retinol product. I started slowly and used 1-2 pumps per week as what is recommended on the packaging. I didn't notice any difference in my skin, except I had extreme sun sensitivity even though I wear sunscreen every day and protect my skin with hats. I don't think I'll even finish this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I can see the difference after a week. Before using this my skin wouldn't stop breaking out and my skin had become blotchy. A friend recommended this product to me and I'm glad she did. Now I only get hormonal breakouts. My skin is brighter and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the BEST! My skin reacts so well to it. Iu2019ve noticed a difference in the texture and even my acne scars. You have to be patient, but with consistent use it makes a difference. Canu2019t wait to try Shaniu2019s other products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Took a few weeks to start seeing results, but my skin looks better than ever - smaller pores, brighter and smoother skin altogether. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Retinol reform on and off for over a year. In that time they changed the formula twice. The previous version featured niacinamide as well and made my skin so smooth and poreless. The current version is a disappointment. They eliminated the niacinamide altogether!  Somehow it emphasizes pores now.   All 3 versions completely eliminated acne for me but did nothing for my fine lines or skin tone...actually makes my skin more reddish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a few Retin-Alt products, so this was my first full retinol product. I've noticed a difference with this product when I have active breakouts, it brings down the size of my pimples and my scarring isn't that bad. This formula is also great for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I follow Shani on Instagram and when she mentioned that this was a gentle form of retinol that would not cause severe peeling and breakouts like other retinols, I ordered the mini size for trial. I have used retinol in the past and my skin was not a fan. Instant peeling, breakouts, the works... and it took forever for my skin to heal from it. Similar thing happened with this product, minus the peeling. My skin was not a fan and from the breakouts that appeared the next day after using this product, I now have acne scars left over that I am trying to heal and get rid of. I know that when you use retinol initially, your skin has a period of turnover where it becomes really bad before the acne clearing, anti-aging effects of retinol really break through, but the initial period was so bad for me that I had to stop using the product.  I have sensitive combo skin and would not recommend this.

reviews.review_title: Docked 1 star due to price and fl.oz.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My 41yr old skin loves this!  I've been using this retionol for 4 months now.  I would give this formula 10 stars and how it performs,  but I feel for the small amount you get for 80$ is not a good value .  I have always taken good care of my skin and I have slight acne at certain times of the month which this has helped with.  This serum instantly plumps my (I) wrinkle I have between my eyes instantly!! I had previously used Murad Retionol serum for over 2 yrs and have switched to this in hopes this would be a better value for 80$, this large bottle of Shanie Darden only last me 3 & half weeks.  For now this is my go to for the best over the counter retionol.  It is worth a try IMO especially if you are in your 40's and looking for a good quality retinoid. u2661

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful serum. I try to use every two to three days. It is a wonderful product. I love that it melds retinol and lactic acid but is gentle enough not to irritate. I add an oil or cream over it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been following Shani Darden for a while on social media and have always been impressed with her products and consider her a valuable resource on skin care. I was so thrilled when I saw Sephora was carrying her products and finally pulled the trigger and bought her Retinol Reform. I've been using this product for a few weeks and I can confidently say it's the best skin care product I've ever used! I can already see my skin clearing up from blemishes and having a smoother, more even texture. My only regret is I didn't order it sooner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very happy. Iu2019ve been wanting to try Shaniu2019s retinol reform for awhile but was reluctant because I have sensitive skin and her website has indicated not intended for sensitive skin. Iu2019m so happy I put my uncertainty aside. I have had zero irritation since day 1. I use every other night as part of my nightly routine and it leaves my skin looking softer with reduced visible fine lines. Iu2019m purchasing the larger size and highly recommend - especially for those with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just began to include this in my regimen... Like the brand...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using for about a month. has cleared my face drastically.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great serum. I use it at night. It does not cause irritation and leaves my skin looking great in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It dehydrated my skin yet didnu2019t provide any of the glowiness youu2019d expect from retinols.  Wanted to love it, but itu2019s a big pass for my 44 year old skin.<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best retinol Iu2019ve ever used! After 2 months of use my skin is glowing! Soft and supple texture, reduced age spots, fine lines and poor appearance. Iu2019ve used different retinol o er the last 10 years and most have been irritating in some way. I had zero issues using it nightly from the from the first day. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time retinol user & I have to say Iu2019m pleasantly surprised at how much I love this & how well itu2019s worked on my skin.  After review checking this, I found a lot of people came to the same conclusion that this is good for first time retinol users. This is what convinced me to purchase & I have come to agree with them.  This helps rejuvenate my skin & heal any active breakouts. I have not experienced any negative reactions to this, it works very well with my other skin care items.  Overall a very good product, I will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted to try this product for years! So happy Sephora carries it and in a trial size. I loved it so much I immediately bought the bigger size. It has made such a difference in my aging skin texture and discoloration (acne scars). Itu2019s instant gratification. I use it daily, didnu2019t have to build up to use, and have zero irritation. My skin tends to get red and this has calmed it. I will never be without this product. I feel like I can ditch everything else I use and just keep this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t believe the hype. Literally ran out of the product SO quickly. I only used 1 pump a day and the bottle was empty in 3 weeks. Really disappointing since it was nearly $90. I have used 1 oz bottles of other retinol and the product lasted me well over 6 weeks. As for the product, it was just u201coku201d. Skinceuticals is the same price and a much better retinol product. Wouldnu2019t recommend.

reviews.review_title: Small size is much smaller than I realized
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the $30 small size but didn't realize exactly how small it would be.  If you regularly purchase many travel size products then this 0.3 ml is 1/5 the size of those.  Now I have not tried the product yet I just received this and unboxed and am surprised how truly mini this is.  They should have priced it at $15.00 not $30.00

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This retinol changed my skin as soon as I incorporated it into my routine. Iu2019m prone to dry skin but can tolerate using it 5 days/week. It noticeably smooths forehead lines and fine lines but also really improves the texture of my skin. Whenever I use it, I wake up with glowing skin! Itu2019s incredible and very worth the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You could use this product till the cows come home and you would never see any difference. An absolute waste of money. Much better products out there.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the hype at ALL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Drunk Elephant Retinol cream & its truly the best Iu2019ve ever tried. I decided to try this one based off of the good reviews, and the ingredients. 2.2% Retinol is VERY hard to come by in Canada, so I was excited to try it as it would be one of the strongest on the market. I did not see any positive results after using it for a month, whereas the DE retinol gives rapid results within one month. The only result Iu2019ve seen is that the product broke me out really bad. Will be returning & switching back to the other Retinol. Would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I fell for the massive celebrity hype surrounding the product and maker. Unfortunately, I think it was mostly that; hype. I've tried a few retinols, and this one had the least effect by far. Nothing bad happened, but it also did not visibly assist with cell turnover whatsoever. I would not recommend or repurchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i was so excited to try this as many people rave about this. i did hear that it was reformulated and the price was lower and that it wasnt the same but i still decided to try it. huge regret. this did nothing for me and it made my skin have more congested bumps. sunday riley A+ Retinoid is far better than this with a stronger percentage and it works. im sorry i even tried to stray away from it.

reviews.review_title: Yes it is small but it works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this thing is really small. I didnu2019t pay attention to the size before purchasing but I am so glad that I didnu2019t return it because it has transformed my skin. You donu2019t need much and I donu2019t use it every day (3 times a week).  Iu2019m hoping to purchase the bigger size when it comes back in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why there are so many mixed reviews on this product because it does wonders for my skin! I've tried other retinol products and none of them make my skin look as radiant as this and I always end up coming back to it. In my opinion, the price is not any different than products we see from Sunday Riley, Drunk Elephant, etc. and is much more worth it!   I have combination skin with an oily T-zone and this works so well with my skin type. I think the lactic acid in the product is what makes me love it even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t believe I spent $39 on something so small. Iu2019m in disbelief at how much product you get. Letu2019s hope I start to see results soon enough. Iu2019m leaving this review as my initial reaction to the product. Iu2019ll leave another review in a few weeks to let everyone know if I saw any results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Retinol is awesome for the skin. Itu2019s the anti aging miracle. My skin is clear of blemishes and looks better than a lot of young people. This is a staple in my skincare routine. I use it everyday at night. Keeps me from getting blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Does nothing beneficial or changing to the skin. Actually made me breakout and has a bit of a sticky texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my daughter she has combo skin and acne. It made a huge difference on her skin i would say noticed after 2 weeks of use some changes. It didn't fade  the discoloration of post acne we are trying a different product for those concerns.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most of the positive reviews here refer to a product that no longer exists. This has been re-formulated beyond recognition. I was really excited to try this product. The first day, I woke up with my skin looking nice...then came the blackheads. I thought I was probably purging, but the blackheads got worse, and I started developing full-on (PAINFUL!!) cysts! This product absolutely wrecked my skin! I deconstructed my entire routine to confirm that this product really was the culprit. This was definitely not purging- I've developed cysts in places I've never even had a pimple before, like under my eyebrows. It's been weeks since I discontinued this, and my skin is still recovering. I wish I'd never heard of this product!! Basically good marketing and a bait and switch. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had great hopes for this product as with its 2.2% Retinol it is one of the strongest available on Canadian markets. Usually retinol controls my breakouts, I do not have acne per se but I do get a few pimples here and there thorough the month. This made me break out like crazy. Painful, large pimples around my jawline and chin. I never break out like this. I thought it might be my skin purging so I gave it a good 2-3 weeks trial but the pimples kept getting worse, no improvement. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Almost purchased it as I am a sucker for marketing hoopla.  Read the ingredient list.  Full of waxes and gums.  No way I would put this on my skin.  There are FAR better retinol products out there free of fillers and unnecessary pore clogging unhealthy ingredients.  Itu2019s a skip.  Thereu2019s nothing redeeming in this product you canu2019t find elsewhere better formulated and appropriately priced.

reviews.review_title: expensive but so far so good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the 0.3 oz size and itu2019s basically the size of a medium sized sample. WAY TOO PRICEY, but then again... so is a lot of good skincare products. Itu2019s nice that they offer a small more affordable size so you can try it out. My skin has not reacted negatively to this and I do see a difference in my skinu2019s appearance when I wake up the next morning. I will continue using it to see if spending the extra money and getting the larger size is worth it. Giving 4/5 stars for now simply due to the price and quantity ratio.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Leaves the skin glowing and hydrated but not oily. Stings a little bit but very comfortable (for my skin type, which is Normal) for first time retinol users. Why 3 stars? The price! There are as good and better retinol serums out there for much less! I enjoyed my free sample, but would not buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells just like the prescription Retin A Iu2019ve had in the past (which I hated). That smell bothers my allergies. I still gave this a try and like some other reviewers, this broke me out. I have used several other Retinols and never had an issue. This is going back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: God, this makes me sad. Iu2019ve been a fan of Shaniu2019s for years. Iu2019ve been using Retinol Reform since it came in a little white bottle and was her only product. You had to order it from her website, and no one had heard about it or her yet. I turned so many friends onto Retinol Reform. Itu2019s the ONLY retinol that didnu2019t dry me out beyond belief and cause flaking. I credit Shani with rescuing me from adult acne. However, since changing the packaging and signing a contract with Sephora, this product has been completely reformulated. All of the sudden, Iu2019m dry, my acne has returned, my face stings and feels tender. Nothing else in my routine has changed, and purging isnu2019t a factor here, as Iu2019ve been using Retinol Reform for years. Iu2019m devastated and am hoping and praying that Shani reads these reviews and returns to her original formula. It was magical, and Iu2019ve lost my hero product. This is what happens when small independent companies go corporate, I guess!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This retinol reform makes my skin feel hydrated instead of dry after placing it on my skin. A little goes a long way, so I donu2019t use too much. This is my first time using retinol of any kind so I was weary and made sure to be cautious. I started using it once a week for a couple of weeks then increased it from there. Then two times and week and so forth which I think helped me. I have combination skin so I mostly used in my t-zone. Helps to clear up any blemishes I have starting. I wish the price was cheaper, but right now is a good investment. Will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say I love retinol, Iu2019ve tried multiple from brands luxury and drug store alike but this one is my favorite and maybe dare I say, my new holy grail ;) u2022First-Ingredients: I love!!! That this has encapsulated retinol, which is why I believe i havenu2019t experienced any dryness or harsh sensitivity, but ontop of this I love how this serum is almost a two in one, offering gentle exfoliating via lactic that helps the skin look so bright and even. Other ingredients that I love are the high concentration of apple fruit extract, green tea, and aloe Vera which all act as antioxidants and provide multiple vitamins and nutrients to the skin, glucosamine HCI which brightens skin and is great for pigmentation, plankton extract which helps skin maintain moisture and offers some environmental protection. Seriously amazing! u2022Next Application/Feel: this serum has the the texture and feel of a very light gel cream, imagine a little lighter then the youth to the people kale /spinach moisturizer, it goes on smooth and feels good on skin, not sticky at all! This is also fragrance free but the natural scent of the product has almost a sweet smell; i canu2019t describe it but itu2019s smells okay haha not bad at all and dissipates after applies on face u2022results: so Iu2019ve been using this on a three times a week rotation for the last two months and all I have to say is wow, I look good lol, my skin is so smooth and bright! I also started noticing fine lines on my forehead before this serum but those have been diminished as well! u2022Cons of this product: when I started first using this product I did get some purging and breakouts, but after a week or so these breakouts went way and my skin became flawless.When you start a new product ESPECIALLY Retinol your skin will likely purge causing some breakouts, but no worries as they are very short lived, just stick through it unless itu2019s really bad then stop haha u2022Facts about me: I have combo-dry sensitive skin and all opinions/views are my own! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised by this retinol formulation as the % is higher yet I feel zero irritation. Other formulas including prescription grade or even Drunk Elephant's retinol leaves my skin feeling dry and irritated. I think the lactic acid really balances out the  drying nature of most retinol by hydrating the deeper layers of skin. My adult acne has calmed, my skin tone is more even and hydrated, the texture has improved within days.  I'm taking 1 star off my rating, because for the price the bottle is very small. Using 1-2 pumps every night will get through this bottle very quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really NEVER write reviews but this product is amazing!! Iu2019ve been using it every night and it never dried my skin out. And I see noticeable results in just one week. Iu2019m SO impressed! This is a must have. Iu2019m only 25 and really donu2019t want to get Botox, so this is amazing. The top picture is before and the bottom picture is one week later!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been reading around - sounds like SD changed the formula. Thatu2019s disappointing. This retinol serum just dries me out and my makeup just sits on my skin the next day, it doesnu2019t assimilate and looks horrendous. Two stars because I donu2019t have the first formula to compare it with and this is meh and no magic, and one star because this is just another example of a celebrity esthetician cheapening a solid product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reformulated product to comply with Canadian standards and gain entry into Canadian markets. Nothing like the original that had 5% retinol rx and 5% lactic acid, Canada doesnu2019t allow such high %u2019s so it has now been decreased to 2.2%. Waste of money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For people reading these reviews, the breakouts people are experiencing is A GOOD THING! It's called purging, and that's what your skin does when introduced to a product like this that works well! The retinol is purging your skin of aaaalll the ick that lays beneath the surface. If you keep using it, there WILL be a light at the end of the tunnel, and your skin will look GREAT! Breakouts are SUPPOSED to happen with products like these! Along with sensitivity, dryness and flaking, they're not from a bad reaction. Do your research and know what you're getting into, and you won't be surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitivity to retinol I would highly recommend you try this product. Every retinol Iu2019ve ever tried has always left my skin horribly dry and peeling for days. This product does not cause my skin to peel at all. The first time I used it I was shocked at how amazing my skin looked instantly the next day. Usually I say that you have to use a product for 30 days to see results but this product showed instant results. Leaves your skin visibly smooth, glowy, and plump.

reviews.review_title: Worked well for sun spots and dullness!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so i got this as a part of my rouge sale haul and the scary reviews started to freak me out. So I tried it for 3 days on small parts of my skin to test and had no issues so went for it on my face. I'm Asian, 34 y.o, combo skin, concerns are age/ sun spots, wrinkles and dullness. This serum is awesome, it visibly helped with the sun spots and dullness. So despite the new formula, it works great for me. Adding to my regular routine!

reviews.review_title: Great at first but then causes acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was good the first day I used it because I donu2019t normally use retinol. After using it for the 3rd time I started noticing small bumps and more acne throughout my face (I also made sure to only use it starting twice a week and adding an extra day to build tolerance)! I really wanted to love it but my skin hasnu2019t been reacting to any of the Shani Darden skincare very well and theyu2019ve all left me with more acne than before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted to try this forever and once Shani's line arrived at Sephora I ordered it immediately. I am not new to retinol, and I used as directed and it DESTROYED my skin within three uses. Painful pimples  on my chin, forehead, and upper lip (the worst). Avoid at all costs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It gave me back breakouts and I am not acne prone or have oily skin. I have used retinol product and Retin-A for years and had never had such reaction. This is the only change I made in my skincare as I like to incorporate one new product at a time so I know this was the culprit. Broke out everywhere . Are all this positive reviews paid or from influencers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a couple of mini bottles to try because I was curious to see how my skin would react to encapsulated retinol which releases over time so maybe more gentle on the skin. For reference I have been a regular user of the Skinceuticals pure retinol. Like some other reviews mentioned though there are way too many ingredients in this formula which can congest skin and cause acne. I had breakouts all over my face and neck after I tried this. Guess itu2019s a night hand cream from now on. Going back to the OG retinol.

reviews.review_title: Theyu2019ve changed this product from original.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used Retinol reform for 6 months and purchased direct from Shani Darden website and was excited to see Sephora carry it. However, this gave me the worst break out Iu2019ve ever had. There was a seamless transition from my old bottle to new one. No other products used. The formula is different from color to the scent it has. I was hoping it was just the packaging that made the product cheaper at Sephora but now I see theyu2019ve changed some ingredients. Makes me so sad. The old formula was magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally buy retinol in Mexico. It is SO much cheaper and the exact same product. We are self-isolating so Mexico is not currently an option. I used a sample of this last night. My eyes (where you are not supposed to put Retinol) are tender and sore and my face feels a bit tight and dry. Why 5 stars then? This is how Retinol feels and Retinol is amazing for skin! This is the only over the counter product, that I have tried, that feels like it actually contains real Retinol. Fingers crossed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using the Obagi retinol for a while but I felt like it wasnu2019t giving me the kick I needed for retinol so I moved to this and even from the first time I tried this- I noticed a change. I have really bad congestion on my forehead mainly like little bumps that just sit there and after using this, Iu2019ve seen them slowly disappear. I didnu2019t experience any peeling or irritation- from the moment Iu2019ve put this on, itu2019s just been gently improving my skin all around. Thank you Shani!

reviews.review_title: Worst breakouts of my adult life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so badly.  I am a licensed aesthetician and take my skincare routine very seriously.  I received a sample of the Retinol Reform serum and was excited to try it.  After almost 2 weeks of using it every other night (to allow for an adjustment period) I am having the worst breakouts I've had in my adult life.  It is absolutely insane.  I haven't changed anything else in my routine or lifestyle so this is most likely the culprit.  I didn't have any other adverse reactions like stinging or peeling so I am surprised by this.  It does look like maybe there was an ingredient change when this was brought to Sephora (and the price lowered) so I wonder if the quality was effected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had  never used a retinol product before but I had such bad skin texture and redness and this product has changed my skin! I use this every other night and use my Biossance Lactic Acid serum on the off days and the two products combined have brightened my skin and leave my skin feeling baby smooth in the morning! LOVE and will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you can only invest in one thing for your skincare, invest in Shani Darden's Retinol Reform. I have already noticed a difference in the few fine lines and dark spots on my face. I have combo skin, more on the dry side, and this does not dry out my face but leaves it so soft in the morning. After cleansing, I will go to bed with just this on my face, nothing else. **BE CAREFUL NOT TO USE WITH AHA'S, ESPECIALLY IF YOU USE CERTAIN PRODUCTS BY THE ORDINARY**  Keep your skincare routine simple and add this stuff in. Fresh Soy Face Wash Dr. Jart Ceramidin Moisturizing Toner Timeless Skincare Vitamin C Serum  Dr. Jart Ceramidin Cream  SPF!!   Evening: Fresh Soy Face Wash Retinol Reform  On the nights I don't use RR: Cleanse The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution Dr. Jart Ceramidin Cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Am loving this retinol. Purchased the mini and went on to purchase the full size. I have been using prescription retinol for years, and wanted to try something new. This came recommended and I'm loving it better than all the ones my dermatologists have given me in the past. In 6 weeks, the sunspots on my face have faded significantly, my skin is smoother and brighter, and it has helped zap incoming acne! I noticed that thicker lines on my forehead have faded, but can't speak to fine lines, as I haven't seen a difference there yet. I use it every day or every other day (depending on whether I use a Vitamin C serum or AHA/BHA products). For reference, I don't have sensitive skin and I am very acclimated to retinol use. If you're just starting to use retinol, I would not use it as often and def wear SPF! Note: I had some problems getting the pump on the mini size to work at first, have to twist it a few times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Worst break out. Clogging product. Was so excited and itu2019s a huge let down. Do not buy

reviews.review_title: Invest in this product! Total game changer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Retinol Reform for 2 yrs now and it's an absolute game changer. My fine lines are reduced, skin texture is even, and it even helps ward off pesky zits. I'm in my early 30s and just trying everything to delay getting botox and so far so good! Definitely the most expensive product in my routine but so worth it. I think if you're going to spend money on one thing, a retinol like this is 100% worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I don't do reviews but I had to because I fell in love with this product, I have very sensitive skin and I have never used retinol before.  Let me tell you, I've been using this product for a week and can already see it working.  I had no reaction or dryness.  My face looks brighter and smoother, my mother noticed immediately.  I am 33 years old and she said I look like 25, my husband told me that I looked younger and he doesn't even know that I am using this product.  I can't wait to see what my face will look like after a month ... I'm very happy with my purchase ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry acne prone sensitive skin. I am in my early 30s. I previously tried a competitor retinol and it made my face peel and it hurt for days afterwards. I bought this with high expectations as I have the aforementioned acne, some fine lines, texture and general aging. I also purchased the oil free moisturizer (Iu2019ll write another review separately) that planned to use in conjunction with this product the following morning to prevent peeling. I have been using this for two weeks and I experienced some purging but then this retinol is helping to remove them and my fine lines are going away fast already! My face feels plumper, which I honestly didnu2019t expect, and my fiancu00e9 asks me constantly if Iu2019m wearing makeup when Iu2019m not. I feel like my face is looking more even these days. I am excited to see what happens going forward. I also bought a lightweight sunscreen to protect my skin during the day. This is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glad I bought the mini size, I've been using this and haven't noticed any difference compared to the one I bought from my local drug store.  I wanted to try this because of a famous youtuber sang it's praises, maybe it works for some people but it has done nothing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super scared of trying this after I ordered it and then saw a bunch of bad reviews saying it causes terrible breakouts. I was so hesitant, I waited a week to start using it. After trying Murad's Youth Retinol serum that gave me huge, painful pimples after using daily for 3 days, you can see why I wasn't in a rush to ruin my face again. I tried a test patch of Darden's retinol reform, just one cheek, and was happy that my skin didn't react. Next, I applied it to my whole face just once a week and, so far, my skin seems to be doing fine. I'm afraid to use it every night, though. I'll probably increase to 2-3 nights a week and hope I don't break out! I haven't been able to find a good retinol product that doesn't give me bad acne because they are usually full of silicones and other pore clogging ingredients. I have sensitive, oily skin and I'm 38 with some fine lines. Maybe this won't be a holy grail product, but I spent $88 on it, so I feel like I need to keep giving it a chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has improved my hyperpigmentation and acne blemishes significantly. For reviewers saying it caused breakouts, retinol increases cell turnover and unclogs the pores. You may have purging going on at first, but that means the product is working. As someone who has dealt with acne since puberty and now hormonal acne as an adult, this product does help!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At the suggestion of a friend who works for a plastic surgeon, I went in search of a retinol cream for pretty severe neck rings. Since turning 50, they have gotten progressively worse, and seems to be the only part of me that physically reveals my age. I was seriously considering some sort of plastic surgery. Since we're home during the quarantine for a few months, I thought I'd give a cream a try. This one was rated well. I use it 3 times a week before bed, and here is my before and after in just 2 weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this! I used PTRu2019s 1.5% retinol serum initially, love this one wayy more. Iu2019m definitely beginning to see a difference in my skin quality, from a product usage perspective a little goes a long way- my kind of product :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try a new Retinol, and this had such good reviews. I have been using it for over a month, and it has caused a terrible breakout on my forehead. It looks like hormonal acne that I had when I was 13. DO NOT BUY
Used it for a month and caused major acne. Switched to Sunday Rileyu2019s retinol and my skin cleared up!! Sorry this didnu2019t work for me :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product almost every night for about a month. I'm conflicted on whether or not I like it. Some days I thought it was making my 11 lines start to disappear some. But others days it looked like it hadn't. Then I went like 7 days im a row without using it and felt like once I started using it again I could see a difference again.  But I'm not going to pay that much to keep using it if im not even sure it's helping much. I will continue using it and see if hopefully after using it for a longer period I will have better results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Darden has taken the *single* retinol serum Iu2019ve ever been able to use on my sensitive but oily skin, reworked the packaging, made it more widely available, paired it with a handful of super underwhelming products to create a u201ccollectionu201d, and  multiplied the ingredient list several times, filling Retinol Reform with cheap fillers, problematic pore-cloggers and irritation-inducing nonsense.  Thanks for less than nothing. Boooooo.  Donu2019t know what Iu2019ll use now. Maybe Iu2019ll try Rx again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have been using this for years and absolutely love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could put zero stars. As a former user of the original retinol reform I am incredibly disappointed with the addition of pore clogging ingredients like plankton, soybean and who knows what other comedogenic ingredients are lurking in it. I wish sheu2019d bring back the OG product which was amazing. Beware if you are acne prone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say this is my first review and that I am close to 50 and I absolutely love this stuff it doesnu2019t burn your face. I donu2019t even think it dries out your face I know the next morning my face looks brighter more healthier end it also looks like itu2019s fading my dark spots so I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m fortunate to have inherited clear skin but was looking to add a stronger daily retinol as I creep closer to 40yo. This product made my face develop deep and large acne (whiteheads) overnight. I stuck with it in case it was my face adjusting but after an entire week, I couldnu2019t take it anymore. After ceasing to use, my skin cleared up almost immediately. For what itu2019s worth, I also tried her Texture Reform and had similar results.  My face doesnu2019t like her cult products for some reason.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it.....but broke out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited when Shani launched her products, however i started to break out. Then I realized most of her products are not non-comdedogenic. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shani is the best... this is the best... cant wait to have a bigger Shani darden collection of products once she comes out with more... SPF next!?

reviews.review_text: Ok, so I've only been using this for 5 nights now, but it has made a difference in my skin already. I'm in my late 30's, but still suffer from horrible cystic acne. TMI I know, but this really is a godsend, and I've tried everything. It's sold out now, but please get more in soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is almost perfect for me. My pores appear to be a bit smaller and the overall radiance and texture of my skin is really nice. This is helping my skin thrive during quarantine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started using this product two weeks ago and itu2019s been great so far. Dark spots from acne has reduced. There is no harsh effect on the skin as it was the first retinol I ever tried. Definitely loving this and canu2019t wait to see the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not see much results after trying it for several weeks. But I will keep continue using the product. It is a very moisturizing cerum and I like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Goodness gracious, this stuff is LIFE CHANGING! Iu2019ve been using it less than a week and the texture of my skin has already improved dramatically. I have oily skin and the odd spot of hyperpigmentation. My makeup applies better, skin is silky smooth and my acne has decreased significantly. Iu2019m buying more Shani Darden stuff right now.

reviews.review_title: I wish I could give it more stars!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After years of frustration with products recommended by dermatologists and going through countless of the bestsellers in acne help, THIS is the product that really works. I heard about Shani Darden on instagram, read about her online and went out on a whim to reach out to her via Instagram - something I have never done before. I told her about my skin type, issues with acne and pleaded for her. SHE RESPONDED!!! Asked for pictures of my face and recommended an entire regime - which I now follow to a T. Shani is so kind and really knows what she is doing. I now swear by this Retinol Reform, iSclinical's active serum and her oil-free moisturizer. It seriously works miracles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Retinol Reform is incredible and does wonders on your skin! I absolutely love it! This will be a staple in my beauty regimen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have just been using this for about a week so can only say, no skin reaction to it & I'm able to use it daily even though I would consider my skin somewhat sensitive although no other issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I had already been using her texture reform and decided it was time to start using this is which is a stronger retinol. Both of those products have changed my skin. I noticed changes in pore size, texture, less breakouts and overall glow within a week of using it.

reviews.review_title: You had me at hello RETINOL REFORM
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using this for a couple of weeks and I am impressed.  I could totally use this every night right off the bat without working my way up as it recommends.  It is a gentle yet effective formula and will be my retinol moving forward unless the formula changes.  I have combination skin, I am in my 30's and I was looking for a retinol game changer.  I found this product on a blog by Shiva Safai so I was skeptical if it was just advertising.  After reading the reviews and ordering it for myself; it's real guys!  My skin is dewy, soft, and I know it will be even more amazing if I used it everyday! The only reason I don't use it daily is I love PTR's Glycolic Acid moisturizer and this product specifically says lay off the AHA products while using this one.  If there was an annoyance that would be it- it's thee bomb!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product changed my skin! I used it a few years ago and remember having great results with eliminating my cystic acne. So when I broke out again recently, I saw this on Sephora and bought it immediately. Itu2019s even better than I remembered. My skin purged for the first 3 weeks, but I knew it had to get worse before it got better since I had a lot of congestion on my cheeks and jawline. All of the closed comedones and congestion I had came to the surface, I extracted them, and as of now I have no new breakouts of cysts! Another huge bonus is the wrinkles in between my eyebrows and laugh lines are diminished. My texture is smoother than Ive ever felt. And my skin has a natural glow. I will never live without this product! This serum is strong so start out with once a week. Iu2019m using it 3-4 times a week with no irritation. I use the Saint Jane CBD serum and a night cream over top in the PM. Make sure you use SPF during the day as well! Iu2019m going to try her oil free moisturizer next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to admit I tried this because of the hype. I thought why not give it a try. I bought this and the cleaning serum. Although I like both if I had to pick one it would be this. I am 39 and still get acne mostly during that time of the month. My acne appears anywhere in my face it doesn't discriminate. I use one pump after cleansing I spread it into 4 dots on my face (forehead, cheeks, and chin) and circular massage it in. My acne does simmer down and I really do enjoy the results. I use it every other night in the evening. I can't buy this product every two weeks so I try ration it out and my skin is maintained. I would recommend and stock up when you have a Sephora coupon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the cleanser, toner and oil free moisturizer off of her website and it came with a sample of this. I love it. I can use it all over my face and under my eyes. It really has changed my face for the better!! i got sick of buying stuff that didnt work. I'm oily acne prone skin. I wanted something that would work and not break me out. I've been using all her stuff for a month now and I love what I see so far...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most expensive item of skincare I own and I will always repurchase (have been buying from her website for years). Every time I use it my skin looks so good the next morning. It clears up any spots that were thinking about popping up and has really helped dimish some wrinkles that were starting by my eyes. I eased into using it per the recommendation and never experienced irritation. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Helped my under eye fine lines after 3 uses!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this for 10 days and used it about 3/4 times. Firstly it feels amazing and hydrating and a little tacky but in the best way. It is so plumping! I use about 1.5 pumps for my night routine. I have also used 0.3 pumps some mornings when I'm going makeup free under my eyes as a refresher. It is worth noting that the pump is very good, and you can pump it so gently that you don't waste product if you want less than a full pump. Even after such a short time I know this stuff is the real thing! I am most critical of the fine lines under my eyes and I find they're even more defined when I wear make up. This has made a noticeable difference. I honestly can't wait to see the results after a couple of months. The best new product I've tried in a long time and I buy a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! I started using it and within days my skin was silkier and the texture smoother. I never had an issue with my skin getting irritated and dry while using it, it just seems like a gentle and hydrating serum with serious power. The smell isnu2019t great but I really donu2019t care about that at all, considering it makes my skin look so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been following Shani for a while on instagram. When she finally hit Sephora I bought the 1 oz bottle. It has 2.2.% retinol which is less then some others on the market but it is paired with 2% lactic acid serum which is really what helps with seeing immediate results.  I have acne prone skin, and acne scarring not many wrinkles but preventative measures are always nice. I started out using twice a week before bed with nothing layered underneath and now I use it every other day with another serum like Estu00e9e Lauder advanced night repair.  Shani says you can use a moisturizer on top if you need added moisture but I figured I would try without to see the results. After first use I definitely noticed a difference in the pigmentation of some of my acne scars. My pores also looked less huge. I havenu2019t taken before and after pictures, but every time I use the product I am happy with the results. I have read that the formula has changed since it was originally formulated but I donu2019t know the difference as I have only tried the version after it hit Sephora.   I took off 1 star because for the price of the product I feel like there are other retinolu2019s on the market (like Sunday Riley that offer 6.5%) that offer more bang for your buck.  Friendly reminder to always use an SPF during the day if you are using a retinol :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product 2 to 3 times a week for the last month, and I have noticed the fine lines in my forehead, which were prominent, have improved in appearance. I apply a moisturizer after applying, which is a must. The price tag is a bit steep for me at the moment, so I probably won't buy it. However, I will keep it in mind as it gets the job done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried a retinol product on my face so I was excited to try Shani Darden Retinol Reform. She recommends using 1-2 times a week to start. I used twice a week for 2 weeks and 3 times the third week. I have no had any irritations to my skin and plan on upping the applications. I should note I donu2019t have sensitive skin.  The product has a slight smell, just sort of lotion-y, but I didnu2019t notice it much. I havenu2019t really seen a change in my skin but I think itu2019s still too early to tell. I put it on at night and in the morning I usually just use water to rinse but this leaves a slight gummy residue and so I need to use a cleanser on those mornings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for a weeks. So far so good. Work same as Ratin-A  from a doctor. Just make sure to apply on dry skin(after you wash your face just wait 30 min.). And use sunscreen with good SPF day time. This retinol work good for fine lines and as a treatment for acne. No redness or peeling for me. Really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with Shani Darden skincare. I find that I am much more willing to pay for high quality skincare products than I am for makeup, and this is no different. If you do not have a good base to work with, then why bother, in my opinion. I just recently turned 30, and thought I really better start transforming my skincare routine. I already love Shani Darden products, so the Shani Darden Retinol Reform seemed like a no brainer as far as somewhere to start. I could not be more pleased with the results. I feel like my skin has a bounce and brightness to it that I frankly did not know it was missing. Looking forward to seeing continued and lasting results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this Product, but was surprised by the strong chemical smell. The Instructions advise to use a few times a week, depending on what your Skin will allow. I tried it once, but couldn't get past the strong chemical smell, and was worried about harming my face. The packaging has a Fancy, High End Product look, and it is a large bottle! I suspect a little goes a long way and it will last a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first serum with retinol thatu2019s been gentle on my skin. I was so tired of my skin getting irritated because of retinol serums. I apply it in the evening to prevent sun exposure. I use it everyday; I apply a moisturizer after the retinol serum. The fine lines on my skin have improved. Other peopleu2019s skin can be more sensitive than mine, so itu2019s better to try one or two days per week to see how your skin reacts to this retinol serum. Shani Darden Retinol Reform is on my list of beauty products I use. I recommend it to anyone who uses retinol serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BUYER BEWARE - THIS PRODUCT HAS BEEN COMPLETELY REFORMULATED. I have been buying this retinol from Shani Dardenu2019s spa for years now. It quickly became a favorite; itu2019s strong retinol and minimal ingredient list is the reason why I was able to see past that 95$ price tag. On March 9, 2020 I got an email from Shaniu2019s spa letting me know that the price dropped to 88$. With no mention that Retinol Reform has been completely reformulated. Iu2019m assuming the company decided to cut corners after Sephora recently acquired the product. I will be trying this new product out and leaving a review accordingly. Still, Iu2019m pretty disappointed with the lack of transparency.

reviews.review_title: My holy grail retinol and a must try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been a fan of Shaniu2019s products for a long time and Iu2019m so exited Sephora now carries her entire line. I love her cleansing serum and moisturizer but her retinol reform is what made the most noticeable difference in my skin.   I would like to mention when I first started using retinol I started with her texture reform and worked my way up to the retinol reform.  Neither texture reform or retinol reform ever irritated or dried out my skin. The biggest changes in my skin that I noticed from using these products was how much they helped with TEXTURE and ACNE, fine lines and wrinkles also! Whenever I would run low on this product and have to wait a few days to receive another in the mail - I could immediately tell in my skin. This product is 100% a holy grail!  If youu2019re more sensitive or havenu2019t used retinol before, Shani recommends starting slowly with her texture reform. Iu2019m now able to use retinol reform every night and my skin thanks me for it everyday!  This (and texture reform) are must try products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin soft but that was about it. I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_title: A must have for acne and aging...

reviews.review_text: this product is amazing. Iu2019m 35 and have been using retinol products for a few years now. I know itu2019s expensive, but weu2019ll worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t hesitate!! This is the best retinol out there imo. My skin looks amazing!! If you have sensitive skin gradually increase usage!!! You will not regret it. Shaniu2019s products are the real deal! You have a fan for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden Retinol Reform is absolutely phenomenal. I use this once in the morning and once at night, I'm in my early 30's and have noticed a significant difference after using this for only a week.  Now on week four of usage and my face is very soft and supple, with little to no noticable wrinkles. I'm very pleased with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3.5 stars   So this didn't do much for my wrinkles, but I was putting it over moisturizer to be safe because I have gotten burned (literally) by retinol before.   However, overall I have noticed a change in the texture and glow of my skin, It looks healthier   I am going to have to try this directly on my skin and see if it works differently.   *This is all after three weeks of testing over a moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My friend swears by these products, so I decided to substitute it for my regular retinol products, and I was very impressed.  The directions suggest using it only once or twice a week to start, and that's about all my skin can usually tolerate from some retinol products, without getting overly dry.  But this one is gentle enough to use more consistently right away.  It's only been a couple of weeks, so I'm still monitoring how my skin improves, but I like something that I can use regularly without drying out my skin too much.  And just a small amount is good for my whole face, so I think it's a good value.  I am going to try the moisturizer next.

reviews.review_title: AMAZING- Helped transform my skin back to normal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ALL Shani Dardenu2019s products are a life saver.  They have literally saved my skin.  I have images I will show of my skin before and after using her products.  I no longer use ANY other product but Shaniu2019s and what she suggests. If you are looking to try a retinol or any new skin care product do not hesitate one bit to try Shaniu2019s.  She is the real deal and great for normal, combo and oily skin types. You rarely find great skin care products for combo, normal and oily skin that do not strip your natural skins oil.  Shaniu2019s does NOT strip natural oils at all- leaving your skin still hydrated but not producing too many oils.   I use all of her products including:  1. Face cleanser 2. Toner 3. Retinol reform 4. Moisturizer 5. Desse Pro Mask 6. Light Stim Handheld for acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 1 oz. bottle of Shani Darden retinol reform, and I think it works pretty good. The bottle itself is very heavy for there to be only 1 oz. of product.
