reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was always scared to use Retinol products since I have sensitive skin but gave this product a try since it came highly recommended. I'm so glad I did. I suffer from dry and sensitive skin and this product gives me the moisture and glow my skin needed. Highly reco for a sensitive and dry skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the product.  My skin has a nice youthful glow. It fill soft and looks hydrated.  I like that the surem goes a long way. It is nice, light and you only use a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice light product. Leaves skin moist not like most other retinol treatments. I like how it feels around my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have actually always stayed away from Retinol products (much to my mother's chagrin - even though I am a grown woman) but when this was recommended to me I decided to try it.  I am in my 50's and wish I had done this sooner.  It has only been a couple of weeks, but my skin looks brighter and has a bit of a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had never heard of the Shani Darden Retinol Reform prior to testing product. The packaging is really nice for this product.  Bottle is a sleek glass bottle and simple but gorgeous.  As with any retinol product you need to start out a few nights a week at the most.  Anymore tends to dry out skin and then makeup application does not look so good.  I put this on after my toner then follow up with a great night time moisturizer.  Skin glows and looks fuller and more even.  Has a nice light scent. So happy to have been able to try this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin and have had issues in the past with Drunk Elephant retinol and am currently using The Ordinary's retinol but have not been impressed. I purchased the mini size being nervous, and I used last night layered with other serum and woke up with a few break out spots totally gone and glowy! I'm in love! Will be purchasing the full size for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I just want to say.... her products are amazing but so is SHE. Two years ago(or so) I messaged her on Instagram after getting diagnosed with a skin condition as a result of being put on the wrong birth control. (the skin condition was just one side effect. There were many more that I had to deal with but the skin condition is the only one that I still have to deal with today and will for the rest of my life.) I found Her on Instagram and was impressed with everything about her... I sent her a message telling her about my u201csituationu201d and just desperately asked for her help. To my surprise, she responded and was so kind but also completely honest with me. I didnu2019t know she had a skincare line at the time and she didnu2019t try to sell me it. She recommended what she thought was best for my skin... when I found out she had a skincare line..I wanted everything. Not because I necessarily thought it would work for my sensitive skin but because people like her.... I will support for as long as I possibly can. There arenu2019t enough people like her out there.  To see her products on Sephora now makes me so happy. It just reassures me that good things do happen to good people. I would recommend following her on Instagram and listening to all her skincare tips. Sorry for the Harry Potter novel. Iu2019m just really excited to see her skincare line on here!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is extremely sensitive and I experienced a little bit of dryness at first, but I just made sure to moisturize well and my face now looks better and brighter than ever! This product is worth its loyal following!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden Retinol Reform was the product I was looking for!! I am African-American and suffer from cystic acne on my chin and cheeks. So of the bumps can last for months. Shani Dardenu2019s Retinol Reform was able to purge those bumps and clam my skin down. This is a pricy item but the benefits are worth the cost. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm definitely happy using my SHANI DARDEN Retinol Reform, It's absolutely amazing. It does absorb good into my skin without over dying it. I like the texture and that it's lightly scented. I did see my forehead fine lines less noticeable, I will continue to use and highly recommend to everyone to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gentle yet highly effective retinol skin treatment. it improved my skin appearance and reduced acne scars i had previously. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this twice per week for about two weeks and am loving it so far! I havenu2019t noticed a major change in my skin just yet, but it does feel much smoother in the morning and has not caused any new breakouts (other retinols usually cause me to wake up with several tiny ones). Looking forward to seeing the long-term results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Helped to even out my skin and I had brighter skin the next morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every other night with a nighttime moisturizer. My skin feels softer and looks healthy. I feel a very very slight tingle or burn when applying, but nothing that lasts and no ill side effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Shani Darden Retinol Reform for about 3 weeks. To give some context, I'm in my early 30s and I used to have acne when I was a teenager so I have texture on my skin and some wrinkles and fine lines are starting to appear. I used this product at night as indicated, it didn't irritate my skin but I generally don't have sensitive skin, so I could use it every other day. I followed with a moisturizer per instructions. The first week I already started noticing results: my skin feels more luminous, with less texture and just soft and clear and like the elasticity is improved. It is pretty amazing, I didn't think I was going to notice such a difference but I did! as far as wrinkles and fine lines go, I noticed some slight improvement at the 3 week mark, not miracles but they look better. It has an herbal scent if you care about that, but it's not a fragrance, you can tell it's from the formula itself, it's not particularly pleasant but it's not that bad either. This is a really nice product and I'm actually very impressed with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's hard to write a complete review only after two weeks but it shows promise. The retinol is the right color (bright yellow) if you know your retinol. The packaging is nice and the instructions are simple. As with any retinol, your skin will feel dry -- this is when you amp up your top layer of moisturizer and you should feel fine. I'll keep using it and report back in a month or so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using sShani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform for couple weeks now. My skin didnu2019t feel any irritating so I have been using it more often. For the past week, I can see my skin is improving and brighter. It also feel smoother. I do recommend this product for anyone trying to fight the aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform and have not noticed any significant results but I think it's too soon to tell. Right off the bat I thought the product was too watery and would take forever to absorb in my skin, I'm glad I was wrong! It's watery enough to where I can spread it evenly in my skin. It also absorbs/dries pretty quickly. It has a mild syrupy smell but nothing unbearable. I'm at the age where wrinkles are inevitable so I'm hoping the Shani Darden Retinol Reform will help to slow it down a little. I've used many retinol products in the past 2-3 years and there's nothing that I've like where I'm willing to repurchase. Everything is either too strong, too thick, or the smell is too much. This retinol reform seems like the perfect balance, especially for my oily acne prone skin, I don't need anything too harsh or thick that it will clog my pores

reviews.review_title: A must addition to your skin care!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Retinol Reform delivers - my skin is so smooth and looks brighter. My facial lines are less noticeable and my skin is firmer. Loving the younger looking results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Ps if you love skincare in general follow her on Instagram too for actual beneficial updates on everything skin related

reviews.review_text: Love this retinol. Itu2019s perfect! Doesnu2019t dry you out, doesnu2019t make you red, DOES tackle the lines and wrinkles and leaves your face happy, fresh and youthful. Sign me up! Best product out there no doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

This retinol cleared up my acne within a few weeks and drastically lightened up my acne spots. It also reduced my pore size and evened out the texture on my face. I started on alternate days but now use it daily. Unlike most retinols, this does not dry out my face or cause any peeling. I do add moisturizer after the retinol has set in my skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tremendous Shani Darden skin care lover. This product bring my skin back to life with a nice glow.

reviews.review_text: This retinol is amazing I love it! This has changed my skin completely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Shaniu2019s retinol reform for two years, and itu2019s the best out there and worth every penny! Itu2019s never been too strong for my sensitive skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Retinol Reform is a product I recommend and go back to. Combining retinol and lactic acid, it's like using Good Genes and your favorite retinol in 1 formula that is non irritating and produces results! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years retinol scared meu2026 There seemed to be so many rules however so many people swear is their anti-aging, beautiful skin, secret weapon.  Let me tell you that the hype is real. This serum is amazing and one of my go to options. It boosts collagen and improves cell turnover without the drying out the skin. This formula also has lactic acid, which helps to brighten and smooth skin, so you get both immediate benefits and long-term results. This is amazing for those who have acne scarring, discoloration, hyperpigmentationu2026 This not only contains retinol and lactic acid but also niacinamide which is a powerhouse at reducing discoloration.   I would recommend this to anyoneu2026 It really works well for all skin conditions and skin types. Even sensitive skin u2013 I just recommend starting by using it every other night and letting your skin get used to it! I also recommend switching it up after you finish your bottle as the effects arenu2019t as good when used month after month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this retinol cream itu2019s so lightweight and luxurious! Iu2019ve noticed a change in my complexion day one onward, definitely recommend for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a bit over a week and using it every other night or so. I havenu2019t noticed a drastic difference other than increased smoothness overall. However I am decking one star because I think my skin may have had a slight negative reaction to it as i had noticed a few small pimples that cropped up on my cheek. Whether that was due to the serum, or the moisturizer I used after that (philosophy miracle worker), or just cyclic skin changes, Iu2019m not sure. But I intend to use for 3 more weeks to see if my skin acclimates to the retinol and no longer has the small pimples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Retinol Reform for about a little over a week now. I can say that I really see a difference in the feel of my skin- itu2019s much softer and smooth. Looks like my fine lines around my eyes and darkness is fading away slowly also. Iu2019m very Pleased with this product! I believe that any woman that was to use this would probably have it on her day to day routine. I like it also because there is no scent to it. It doesnu2019t leave your skin cloudy, sticky or patchy either! Perfect product for me I can say! I would recommend this product to all my family and friends that I know, so donu2019t wait around- get it and I Promise you will be amazed at how it works and how fast it works! I Love it!

reviews.review_text: I love this product. It makes my skin feel hydrated and soft. It also removed all minor blemishes I had. It was easy to apply.  Received this for free from pinchme

reviews.review_title: Hands down, my absolute favorite serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum changed my skin drastically for the better. I never had really bad acne, just stubborn, persistent blemishes with some cystic acne. I have fair skin, so any blemish leaves a red mark that takes forever to go away and this has helped with that so much. Retinol Reform has really helped to keep my skin clear and I get compliments about my skin almost daily. It is hands down, my absolute favorite product. I can't live without it now!

reviews.review_text: I have a mild case of rosacia and it was recommended to me to use a product with lactic acid in it. I was pleasantly surprised to notice a slight decrease in redness after just one use of this product. I am hopeful after continue use the redness will continue to go away.  My skin also appears tighter/firmer. I have been using this product for about a week, every other night and am hopeful to continue seeing great results with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my New Shani Darden Retinol Reform. I have been using it for past 2x weeks every night 1-2 small pumps. After 5 minutes I follow with my moisturizer. My face looks glowing in the morning my forehead wrinkles are tight- so amazing!!!! My new must.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product on cleansed skin before bedtime, then I used my normal night cream. Let me tell you I noticed my skin softer. It left my face feeling clean and fresh. With no oily feeling after. In the morning my face felt more hydrated. I will definitely be throwing this into my skin care routine a few times a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a week. My skin absorbs itu2019s very fast and I feel like it has slightly reduced my fine lines (I am 29). The only bad part about this product is the smell; it stinks so bad to me! I always make sure I use good smelling moisturizer on top it to cover the smell. I believe it will be very effective over time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from PINCHME to review. I have been using this daily for a little over one week now

I hope it will fade ma acne scars. but so far it is making my skin smoother and helping with my forehead wrinkles. i am only using this 2 times a week for now maybe will add it 3 times in about 2 weeks.

reviews.review_text: started using about 9 days ago and I swear- I look a bit younger-no side effects at all-so easy to use -thanks for such a great product!

reviews.review_text: Love the texture of this product. Iu2019ve started using this product gradually & have received many compliments on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use and dries down quickly. Got rid of my dry winter flakiness in about a week. Sits well under moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After the first time of using this product, my skin broke out.  I had two extremely large pimples on my chin and cheek.  I do have oily skin, but I do not usually have breakouts like that, especially at the same time. The smell was something that also bothered me.  It is odd yet subtle but  not very pleasing. I was frustrated so I discontinued using the product after the second day. I wanted to give the product a fair shot, so I used it again the following week.  After the first two days, I did not have any breakouts so I continued to use it for the other five days.  I have to say that I do not notice a difference in fine lines by my eyes, but my skin is tighter.  I have melasma, but the product did not seem to make any improvement to that.  It did however make my acne scars fade to be lighter in color.   The product lives up to some of its claims, but I think that there might be better products out there especially from a dermatologist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product works good, itu2019s not greasy and absorbers into the skin nicely. You donu2019t need a lot of it either. The only thing I donu2019t like is the smell it reminds me of cigarette butts sitting in water. It could be just me or maybe the sample I recieved is old. If it smelled better I would rate it 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I have sensitive skin, prone to getting flakes when using retinol products.  However, I really did like the Shani Darden Retinol Reform.  I used sparingly as not to anger my skin and always used a moisturizer with SPF after, which is key.  After about 3 uses, I did notice my skin had a subtle glow that I had not seen for awhile. My fine lines appeared less noticeable and I personally thought the pores on either side of my nose were less visible. I am definitely a believer in this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleased with productIu2019ve been using the product for a couple weeks now. I love the consistency as well as the way it feels on my skin. Iu2019ve been using it every other evening. My skin is looking great. Smaller pores and smoother skin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying, I do not think I NEED retinol but I gave this a try once a week for the last two weeks. My skin is not sensitive at all but I did notice it was a slight bit after the first time use. I think I continued I would build up a tolerance for sure. I think this would be a good first start for others or a good switch for someone looking for something that wont dry their skin out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this formula it worked great on my skin I could definitely tell a difference in my fine lines and wrinkles. It worked really well with my foundation and my face felt very hydrated. I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a retinol newbie before trying this dream product and now I'm a convert for life! I started slow, as advised, and have worked up to 4x a week now in my second month of usage. I noticed regeneration and brightness first, and slowly textural changes are starting to become more clear as well. Pleasant smell and texture for being the big guns! Will continue with it and excited to see more results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this amazing Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform for 2 weeks,  and noticed amazing results.  It brightened my skin,  and i started noticing wrinkles diminishing around my eyes.  This stuff is the best stuff i've ever used so far. Definitely will be purchasing more of this product when its gone!
